Cooking_Steps: Mix 2tbsp chili powder, 1/2 tbsp of garlic powder, 1/2 tbsp of onion powder, 1/2 tbsp of salt, 1/2 tbsp of pepper, less than 1/2 tbsp of oregano (optional, i dont use oregano) other optional- you can add cumin or red pepper. now you know the secret, have fun creating you own taco-meat masterpiece!

Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups cold water 3/4 cup packed brown sugar 1/2 cup soy sauce 1 teaspoon garlic powder (or granulated garlic) 3 tablespoons corn starch 1 teaspoon sesame oil
Cooking_Steps: Mix all 6 ingredients together in a saucepan and then put over medium heat on the stove. Whisk it continually and don’t turn your back on it. The color will change and darken as the sauce begins to thicken. Once it has thickened, take it off the heat. It keeps very well in the fridge.

Ingredients: 3 Roma tomatoes 1 garlic clove 2 tbsp red wine vinegar 4 tbsp olive oil pepper salt
Cooking_Steps: SingForYourSupperBlog - more here!

Ingredients: 16 ounces natural American cheese, 8 ounces sharp Cheddar cheese, 1 1/2 cup milk, 1 teaspoon cumin powder, optional: (per your taste) Green Chilies, Rotel, Franks Red Hot,
Cooking_Steps: Microwave directions: Place all the ingredients inside a large microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high for 5 minutes, stopping to stir every 1 to 2 minutes. The mixture might seem watery during the first few stirs, but it should come together as a nice runny dip after all the cheese is melted. Serve immediately as a dip with tortilla chips. You can cool this in a loaf pan and refrigerate for a week to use as you would use traditional Velveeta. Slow cooker directions: Place all the ingredients in a small slow cooker (that will fit at least 4 cups of liquid). Turn it on high for 2½ hours. Mix the ingredients every hour to prevent the cheese from sticking to the walls and possibly burning. Reduce the heat to the lowest setting, and enjoy! recipe submitted by Momables.com - Full details here!

Ingredients: 1 cup mayonnaise 5 tablespoons honey 1/4 cup yellow mustard 2 1/2 tablespoons sugar 2 tablespoons lemon juice
Cooking_Steps: Stir all ingredients together in a bowl.

Ingredients: 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, divided 3 1/2 cups corn kernels (from about 4 ears of fresh corn, or 16 ounces frozen corn, thawed, drained and patted dry) 1/2 teaspoon salt Pinch ground black pepper 1 cup finely chopped yellow onion (about 1 small to medium onion) ½ cup finely chopped red bell pepper (about ½ a pepper) 1/4 cup finely chopped green onions (about 1 bunch) 1 jalapeño, seeded and minced 2 cloves garlic, minced 1/2 cup mayonnaise Pinch cayenne pepper 4 ounces sharp cheddar cheese, divided 4 ounces Monterey Jack cheese, divided
Cooking_Steps: 1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. 2. Melt 1 tablespoon of the butter in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat. Add the corn, salt, and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the kernels turn deep golden brown, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a bowl. 3. Melt the remaining tablespoon of butter in the skillet. Add the onions and bell peppers and cook, stirring often, until the onions are wilted, about 2 minutes. Add the green onions, jalapeno, and garlic and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes, or until the vegetables are softened. Transfer to the bowl with the corn. 4. Add the mayonnaise, half of the cheddar cheese, half of the Monterey Jack cheese, and the cayenne and mix well to combine. Pour into an 8-inch square or other 1 to 2-quart size baking dish and sprinkle the remaining cheese on top. Bake until bubbly and golden brown, about 20 minutes. Serve hot with tortilla chips. much more at http://www.browneyedbaker.com/hot-corn-dip-recipe/

Ingredients: 1 cup mustard powder 1/2 cup vinegar 2/3 cup sugar 1/2 cup water 1 pinch salt
Cooking_Steps: 1 Combine all the ingredients in a saucepan. 2 Bring to a boil, reduce heat& simmer 10 minutes. 3 Place in sterilized jar& refrigerate.

Ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) jar jelly - I prefer Apple 2 -3 finely chopped jalapeno peppers
Cooking_Steps: 1 Spoon out apple jelly into a saucepan. 2 Add chopped jalapenos. 3 Bring to a boil and let boil for 2 minutes. 4 (This could also be done in a microwave). 5 You can add a drop or two of food coloring if you want. 6 Pour mixture into sterilized jar and lid; turn upside down for 5 minutes, then upright and it will seal. 7 Or you can do it the lazy the way like I did- I poured it back into the jar I bought the apple jelly in (didnt even rinse the jar out), tightened the lid on and turn upside down and it sealed itself again. 8 (I should put a disclaimer that I am not sure if you should do it the lazy way or not-but I keep the jar in the frig-no worries!).

Ingredients: 10 ounces frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained 1 lb Velveeta cheese (2% fat--this is the reduced fat version) 8 ounces cream cheese (light) 1 jar salsa (I used 3/4 full jar of a 16 ounce jar) A handful of chopped cilantro (optional-but good)
Cooking_Steps: 1) Cut the Velveeta and cream cheese into cubes and place all ingredients in a microwaveable-safe dish. Heat until cheese has melted and stir to combine all ingredients. 2) If you prefer, you can place all the ingredients in an oven safe dish and bake until the dip is heated through--continuing to stir to mix all ingredients. 3) OR, you can place all ingredients in a crockpot and heat until cheese has melted (continuing to stir the mixture to combine ingredients). It should take somewhere around an hour to have the cheeses melt (but check as crockpots vary). This particular method is great if you can leave it on the low setting--then your dip will stay warm for a while. But I bet it wont last! More at haystackandchampagne.BlogSpot.com

Ingredients: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil 2 tablespoons canola oil 1 large onion, peeled and chopped 2 tablespoons chopped garlic 1/3 cup packed dark brown sugar 1 ½ teaspoon ground allspice ¾ teaspoon dry thyme ¾ teaspoon black pepper ½ teaspoon ground cloves ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon Pinch cayenne ½ cup reduced-sodium soy sauce or tamari ½ cup red-wine vinegar
Cooking_Steps: Heat olive and canola oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, cover and cook, removing lid to stir often, until the onions are softened but not browned, 4 to 6 minutes. Stir in brown sugar, allspice, thyme, pepper, cloves, cinnamon and cayenne and remove from the heat. Stir in soy sauce or tamari and red wine vinegar. Cool completely before marinating meat. Marinating Times: 15 to 30 minutes for seafood or tofu. 2 to 24 hours for chicken or pork. 4 to 24 hours for steak. Discard used marinade and do not re-use.

Ingredients: Pineapple Sauce Catsup Brown Sugar Worcestershire
Cooking_Steps: Mix the reserved pineapple syrup, 1/2 cup of catsup. 1/4 cup of brown sugar, 2 teaspoons of Worcestershire sauce, and a few drops of liquid smoke, heat to boiling.

Ingredients: 1 cup Italian dressing 1 (12 ounce) can beer 2 tablespoons fresh minced garlic 1 teaspoon black pepper
Cooking_Steps: 1 Mix together all ingredients. 2 Pour over chicken pieces, toss to coat. 3 Refrigerate for at least 8 hours. 4 Grill or bake chicken as desired (for boneless and skinless chicken breasts grill for about 4-5 minutes each side).

Ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) jar of your favorite salsa 1/2 cup Italian dressing
Cooking_Steps: 1 Mix together. 2 Serve with tortilla chips.

Ingredients: (1) 12-oz package fresh, uncooked cranberries, diced, 1/4 cup green onion, chopped, 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and diced, 2 Tbsp. cilantro, chopped (optional), 1 1/4 cup sugar, 1 Tbsp. lemon juice, Dash of salt, (2) 8-oz packages cream cheese, softened,
Cooking_Steps: In a medium-sized bowl, add chopped cranberries, green onion, cilantro and jalapeno. Pour sugar, lemon juice and salt over cranberry mixture and stir gently until blended. Cover with plastic wrap and place in refrigerator for at least one hour. If you prefer less tart cranberries, keep in the refrigerator overnight. Take cranberry mixture out of the refrigerator and stir all ingredients together. Strain out the liquid using a colander with small holes. Spread cream cheese over bottom of a pie plate or 9×9 dish. Pour cranberry mixture over cream cheese and keep in refrigerator until ready to serve. Serve with Ritz crackers :)

Ingredients: 1 T unsalted butter 1 T flour 3/4 cup milk 1 clove garlic, finely grated or minced 1 jalapeno pepper, finely minced 1 cup Colby Jack cheese 1/2 -1 tsp cayenne pepper
Cooking_Steps: In a small sauce pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add flour and whisk to combine, cooking about one minute until smooth. Add milk, whisking to incorporate. Add garlic and jalapeno. Switch to a wooden spoon and stir frequently until thickened, about 15 minutes. The sauce should begin to coat the back of the spoon. Remove from heat and stir in cheese. Add cayenne pepper to taste.

Ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, room temperature 1/2 cup mayonnaise 1/2 cup cheddar cheese, shredded 1/2 cup parmigiano reggiano (parmesan), grated 1 (4 ounce) can sliced jalapenos (pickled) 2 jalapeno peppers, chopped (optional) 1/4 cup panko bread crumbs 1/4 cup parmigiano reggiano (parmesan), grated
Cooking_Steps: 1.Mix the cream cheese, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, parmigiano reggiano and jalapenos in a bowl and pour into a baking dish. 2.Mix the panko bread crumbs and parmigiano reggiano and sprinkle over the dip. 3.Bake in a preheated 350F oven until the sides are bubbling and the cheese cheese has melted and turned golden brown on top, about 20 minutes.

Ingredients: 1/4 cup mayo 1/4 cup lowfat sour cream 1/4 cup (plus 2 tablespoons) lowfat buttermilk 1 tablespoon Hidden Valley Ranch Dressing (the powder) 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder dash of cayenne 5-6 hot pickles jalapeno slices, finely chopped
Cooking_Steps: Mix ingredients together (adding additional buttermilk until desired consistency). Refrigerate until ready to use.

Ingredients: 3 jalapenos, sliced 3 cloves garlic, sliced 2 cans chopped tomatoes salt and pepper
Cooking_Steps: 1 Slice the garlic and the jalapenos and toss them into the blender, blend until chopped fine. 2 Add cans of tomatoes, with juice, pulse until blended. 3 Serve with sour cream and tortilla chips

Ingredients: 12 oz shrimp, peeled, cleaned and chopped into 1/2 inch pieces (you can use mini shrimp if you want to keep them whole), 8 oz fully cooked smoked sausage, sliced, 1 onion, chopped, 1 bell pepper, red or green, chopped, 2 ribs celery, chopped, 1 Tbsp olive oil, 2 tsp Tabasco Original Red sauce, 12 oz cream cheese, cubed, 8 oz Colby-Jack cheese, grated, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp ground pepper, 1 tsp thyme, 1 tsp dried parsley for garnish,
Cooking_Steps: FrugalAnticsRecipes - click here!!

Ingredients: 1 egg, at room temperature 1 1/4 cups canola oil 1 teaspoon salt 1/2 teaspoon sugar 2-3 tablespoons seasoned rice vinegar
Cooking_Steps: 1 Crack egg into the bowl of a food processor. 2 Add salt and sugar, and process until well combined. 3 With the motor running, add the oil in a slow, steady stream until all is incorporated. 4 With the machine running, add the rice vinegar. 5 Cover, and refrigerate for at least an hour, before ready to use.

Ingredients: 6 egg yolks 1 1/2 tablespoons hot water 20 fluid ounces clarified butter 2 tablespoons Key lime juice, or more if needed Pinch of salt Cayenne pepper or Tabasco sauce, to taste
Cooking_Steps: Combine egg yolks and hot water in a bowl and thicken over simmering water, whipping constantly. (Adding a little bit of the lime juice at this point will make the mixture more stable and less liable to "break.") When eggs are a smooth custard, remove from heat. Slowly add warm clarified butter, whipping constantly. Add Key lime juice, salt and cayenne pepper. Adjust flavor and consistency.

Ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can refried beans 1 (16 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed 1 (4 ounce) can mild green chilies, diced 1 cup frozen corn 1 cup mexican cheese, shredded
Cooking_Steps: 1 Mix together the refried beans and chiles. 2 Spread bean mixture into a 8x8 oven proof pan. 3 Layer on black beans and corn. 4 Top with shredded cheese. 5 Bake at 350 for 15 minutes or until cheese is melted and dip is bubbly. 6 Serve with tortilla chips.

Ingredients: 1 rounded tablespoon orange marmalade, seedless raspberry, grape or strawberry jam or jelly - scrape the bottom of the jar 2 teaspoons Dijon or spicy mustard (optional) 2 tablespoons white wine vinegar or juice of 1 lemon 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil Salt and Pepper to taste
Cooking_Steps: To the bottom of a almost-empty jam or jelly jar, add the other ingredients and shake to combine. Chill in the refrigerator

Ingredients: 5 chicken breasts, cooked and shredded 5 ounces Franks red hot sauce, the smaller bottle 16 ounces light cream cheese 1/2 light blue cheese dressing, we like maries 1 cup light monterey jack cheese
Cooking_Steps: 1 Preheat oven to 350. 2 after shredding chicken breasts, stir all ingredients except monteray jack cheese over heat in a large frying pan until blended. 3 pour into greased loaf pan, top with cheese. 4 cook in oven for 30 minutes or until bubbly. 5 serve with celery and carrot sticks.

Ingredients: 3/4 cup raisins 1 cup applesauce 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon 1 cup natural creamy peanut butter
Cooking_Steps: Put the raisins, applesauce, and cinnamon in a small saucepan and bring to boil; reduce heat to medium and simmer for eight to 10 minutes or until raisins have plumped up. Place mixture in a food processor. Add the peanut butter and pulse until smooth. Spread onto whole wheat crackers, bread, fruit slices, or celery sticks. nutritional info based on 2 tablespoons

Ingredients: 8 oz. plain non-fat yogurt container of reduced fat bleu cheese crumbles worcestershire sauce to taste
Cooking_Steps: combine ingredients in a bowl. chill until served.

Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups low-fat sour cream or nonfat sour cream 10 ounces frozen chopped spinach, thawed and strained 4 teaspoons ranch dressing mix
Cooking_Steps: 1 Mix all ingredients together until well blended. 2 You can also put in food processor and pulse to blend. 3 Refrigerate @ least 2 hrs before serving.

Ingredients: 6 oz can tomato paste 1/4 cup honey (or agave) 1/2 cup white vinegar 1/4 cup water 1 tsp sugar 3/4 tsp salt 1/4 tsp onion powder 1/8 tsp garlic powder
Cooking_Steps: Throw all of the ingredients in a saucepan over medium heat, whisk until smooth. When it comes to a boil, reduce the heat and cover until cooled. Chill and store in the fridge in the covered container.

Ingredients: 1/2 cup honey 1/4 cup softened butter 1/4 cup chopped ripe mango
Cooking_Steps: MIx

Ingredients: 1 large ripe fragrant mango 2 tablespoons each red and yellow bell peppers, finely diced 1 tablespoon minced serrano chile Juice of 1 ripe Mexican lime
Cooking_Steps: Peel the mango and cut the flesh away from the seed. Chop finely, and mix with the remaining ingredients, adding a few drops of lime juice to temper the sweetness of the mango.

Ingredients: 1/2 cup mayonnaise 2 tablespoons ketchup 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice Coarse salt
Cooking_Steps: â€¢In a small bowl whisk together mayonnaise, ketchup, and lemon juice; season with salt.

Ingredients: 2 tablespoons mayonnaise 1 tablespoon prepared yellow mustard 1 tablespoon white sugar
Cooking_Steps: In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, mustard and sugar until well blended. I like to stir 50 times clockwise, and 50 times counter clockwise to get the sauce nice and thick.

Ingredients: 1 lb. hamburger 1 lb. sausage 1 can chili no beans 1 3lb. block velveeta cheese
Cooking_Steps: brown hamburger and sausage in skillet, drain, place into crockpot, add can of chili no beans. stir together. then add cubed cheese into crockpot.. cook on high until cheese starts melting. stir. set temp. on low or medium and stir occasionally.

Ingredients: 16oz sour cream 8oz cream cheese, softened 2 cup cheddar cheese, shredded 1/2 cup chopped ham 1 green onion, chopped 1/4 tsp hot sauce 1 tsp Worcestershire sauce salt pepper 16 oz French bread loaf
Cooking_Steps: TheBestRecipesandMore - more here!

Ingredients: 3/4 pound ground beef, 2 cloves garlic, 1/2 cup chopped onion, 16 ounces (2 bars) low fat cream cheese, 1 cup low fat sour cream, 1/2 cup light mayo (real), 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded swiss cheese, 1 cup chopped bacon crumbles, cooked (about 6-8 slices), 1/4 cup chopped pickles (optional), 1/2 cup chopped cilantro, 3/4 cup cherry tomatoes, chopped (or pico de gallo), ketchup and mustard for garnish,
Cooking_Steps: Preheat oven to 350F Brown hamburger and garlic in a medium skillet over medium/high heat. Crumble as you brown. About half way through, add in the onion and stir to combine. When beef is fully cooked and onion is translucent and fragrant, drain of any excess oil and set aside. In a high powered blender, combine cream cheese, sour cream, mayo, and both cheeses. Pulse until combined. Pour cream cheese mixture into a large bowl and stir in the beef, bacon, pickles, cilantro, and tomatoes. Pour mixture into a prepared baking dish. Sprinkle with more cheese if desired. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is bubbly and melty. Serve hot garnished with ketchup and mustard. from USrecipe - more here!

Ingredients: 8 oz. Cream Cheese, room temperature , 3 oz. box instant banana cream pudding mix , 4 oz. sweetened condensed milk , 2 bananas, mashed , 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice , 2 cups frozen whipped topping, soft ,
Cooking_Steps: RecipesForMyBoys.com - more here!

Ingredients: 1-1/2 pound bacon, cooked, drained, crumbled, and divided , 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese , 2 (8-ounce) packages cream cheese, softened , 1/2 cup sour cream , 1/4 cup mayonnaise , 1 cup cheddar cheese (shredded) or to taste , 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning , 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder (or to taste) , 1 tablespoons mustard , 2 cups chopped seeded tomatoes , 1-1/2 cup shredded Iceberg lettuce , pepper an salt to taste , Chips, Crackers, Pita, for dipping ,
Cooking_Steps: ParkersGeneral - more here!

Ingredients: 1 pound tomatillos 1 pound tomatoes 1 red onion 3 jalapeno peppers Salt Cilantro, chopped
Cooking_Steps: askGeorgie.com - much more here!

Ingredients: 16 ounces sour cream 16 slices (12-ounce package) bacon, cooked and crumbled 8 ounces sharp cheddar cheese, shredded (about 2 cups) 1/3 cup thinly sliced scallions or chives
Cooking_Steps: Combine all ingredients in a medium bowl and refrigerate for at least one hour before serving to allow flavors to meld together. Garnish with extra shredded cheese, crumbled bacon, and chopped chives. Serve with your favorite potato chips or pretzel crisps. Dip can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.

Ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese 1 (4 ounce) can small shrimp, drained 1/2 (12 ounce) bottle cocktail sauce
Cooking_Steps: 1.Spread the cream cheese on the bottom of a 8 inch square serving dish. Layer the shrimp over the cream cheese. Pour the cocktail sauce over the top.

Ingredients: 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons ketchup, 2 tablespoon hot sauce, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper,
Cooking_Steps: Mix all ingredients together until smooth. Cover and store refrigerated until ready to serve.

Ingredients: 1 tablespoon chili powder 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder 1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper (you can add more or less of this depending on how much heat you like) 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano 1/2 teaspoon paprika 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin 1 teaspoon sea salt 1 teaspoon black pepper
Cooking_Steps: MariaProvenzano.com - more details here!

Ingredients: 32 ounces plain yogurt 2 cucumber ( regular, peeled and seeded ) 3 clove(s) garlic ( crushed ) 2 teaspoons red wine vinegar 1 teaspoon lemon juice ( fresh ) 1/2 teaspoon dill weed ( dried ) to taste salt to taste black pepper to taste olive oil ( drizzle, extra virgin )
Cooking_Steps: Strain yogurt using a cheesecloth over a bowl (if you don’t have that, a strainer lined with a coffee filter will work) fora couple of hours (I let mine strain for about 6 hours) or overnight to get out as much moisture as possible (I know that this step sounds funny, but I promise that if you dont do it, your sauce will be runny and not as delicious). Shred or grate the cucumbers and blot them with a paper towel or clean kitchen towel to get rid of as much moisture as possible. Mix together the strained yogurt, shredded cucumbers, garlic, vinegar and lemon juice. Add salt and pepper to taste. Keep in the fridge until serving (let the flavors come together for about 30 minutes before serving). If you want, drizzle a little olive oil over the top before serving.

Ingredients: 3 tablespoons butter 1 pound fresh mushrooms, sliced 1 small onion, chopped 1 1/2 tablespoons all-purpose flour 1 cup sour cream 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice 1 pinch salt and pepper to taste 1/3 cup Parmesan cheese
Cooking_Steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 2. Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in the mushrooms and onion, and cook until tender. Sprinkle with the flour. Reduce heat to low, and continue cooking 5 minutes. Mix in sour cream and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Transfer to a small casserole dish, and top with Parmesan cheese. 3. Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly.

Ingredients: Makes 1/2 cup 1/4 cup Dijon mustard 2 tablespoons grainy mustard 1 tablespoon prepared horseradish Coarse salt and ground pepper
Cooking_Steps: In a small bowl, stir together Dijon mustard, grainy mustard, and horseradish. Season with coarse salt and ground pepper.

Ingredients: 3/4 cup Louisiana Hot Sauce or 1/2 cup (I prefer 3/4) 1 cup Kraft Ranch Dressing 2 packages of Philadelphia Cream Cheese 2 8 oz. cans chunck chicken (drained) 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
Cooking_Steps: 1. Drain the chicken and spread it across the glass pan (crumbling it up) 2. Mix hot sauce, ranch, and cream cheese in a bowl 3. Pour over the chicken 4. Cover with the cheese 5. Bake at 350 for 25 min or until cheese is brown around the edges 6. Serve with tortilla chips, crunchy bread, or as a sandwich

Ingredients: 4 teaspoon of cornstarch 1/4 cup of sugar 1/4 cup of wine vinegar 1/4 cup of regular strength chicken 2 tablespoons of minced fresh cilantro 1 1/2 teaspoon of dry cilantro leaves 2 tablespoons of soy sauce 2 tablespoons of dry sherry 1/2 teaspoon of ground ginger 1/4 teaspoon of salt 1/4 teaspoon of crushed red pepper
Cooking_Steps: Stir together all ingredients. Use however you would like.

Ingredients: 5 - 6 green onions 8 oz. cheddar cheese, shredded 1 1/2 cups mayonnaise 1 jar Bacon Bits 1 pkg. slivered almonds
Cooking_Steps: Chop the green onions. Shred the cheddar cheese. Mix the onions, cheese, mayo, bacon bits, and slivered almonds together. Chill for a couple hours. Serve with Ritz crackers or corn chips.

Ingredients: 2 cups apple cider vinegar, 1 1/2 cups apple cider, 1 cup dark brown sugar, 1 tablespoon yellow mustard seed, 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard, 1/2 cup tomato paste, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper, 2 smoked pork bones,
Cooking_Steps: Combine the cider vinegar, apple cider, brown sugar, mustard seed, Dijon mustard, tomato paste, salt, black pepper, and neck bones in a heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium heat Simmer until the sauce thickens, 30 to 40 minutes. Skim any foam from the surface of the liquid and discard. Remove and discard the neck bones. Cool the sauce to room temperature or use immediately.

Ingredients: 4 cups milk 1/2 cup Nutella Whipped Cream or Marshmallows
Cooking_Steps: In a medium sauce pan over medium-low heat, whisk together milk and Nutella until the Nutella is melted and milk gets nice and warm. Serve in mugs with the Marshmallows :) Microwave Method: Pour water/milk into microwavable cup and heat for 1-2 min depending on the power of your microwave. Add Nutella and microwave for another minute. Stir and serve.

Ingredients: 7 oz green olives 8 ounce cream cheese 1/2 cup pecans
Cooking_Steps: Drain olives. Beat cream cheese until smooth and creamy. Combine olives, cream cheese, and pecans. Refrigerate. Serve with crackers or chips.

Ingredients: one 3 /12 ounce can of smoked oysters 1/2pint of sour cream Worcestershire sauce Tabasco sauce Salt
Cooking_Steps: Drain the oysters and chop into very small pieces. Stir in sour cream. Add salt to taste. Add 1 or 2 teaspoons of Worcestershire sauce and a couple drops of Tabasco sauce, depending on how hot you like it. Mix well and place in refrigerator. Needs to be made several hours ahead for flavor. Serve with potato chips

Ingredients: 1/4 Cup Margarine ( stick or other) 1/2 Tablespoon Garlic Powder Pinch of Salt ( very small)
Cooking_Steps: Melt Margarine in the microwave Add salt and powder Mix and Enjoy!

Ingredients: 3 tablespoons butter 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour 1 cup milk ½ cup chicken broth ½ tablespoon Dijon mustard {if you like a strong mustard taste, use 1 tablespoon} ¾ teaspoon Worcestershire sauce ½ cup finely grated Parmesan cheese Parsley, for garnish Salt and pepper, to taste
Cooking_Steps: Melt butter in a medium sauce pan over medium heat. Whisk in the flour to form a roux, cook for 1 to 2 minutes. Slowly pour in the milk and chicken broth while whisking constantly, make sure there are no clumps. Whisk constantly until the mixture begins to thicken, about 5 to 7 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and Parmesan cheese, until the cheese is melted. Season sauce with salt and pepper. Keep the sauce warm.

Ingredients: 1 small to medium sized jar of pesto sauce (found by pasta sauces) 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese (or as much as you want) 1 teaspoon olive oil (or enough to make the consistency you prefer) Optional: 1 bag pretzel chips or pita chips
Cooking_Steps: Stir parmesan cheese into pesto sauce along with olive oil and pour into bowl or serve right out of the jar! Makes an awesome & easy alternative to everyday chip dips.

Ingredients: 1/2 Cup yogurt (plain, vanilla, flavored, organic, greek - the possibilities are endless!) 1/4 Cup peanut butter (chunky, creamy, natural - the possibilities are endless, too!) 1 Tbs honey 1/2 Tsp vanilla extract
Cooking_Steps: Put all ingredients in a bowl and mix very well with a spoon to get rid of lumps. Cut up fruit to dip in this healthy peanut butter dip alternative!

Ingredients: 1/2 pound pepperoni sausage, diced 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened
Cooking_Steps: 1.Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 2.In a medium baking dish, mix the pepperoni, cream of mushroom soup and cream cheese. 3.Bake uncovered 15 minutes, or until bubbly and lightly browned

Ingredients: 8 oz. package of pepperoni 8 oz. sour cream 1/4 teaspoon seasoned salt Loaf of French or Italian bread
Cooking_Steps: Finely chop pepperoni and mix with sour cream and seasoned salt. Cover a refrigerate for 2 days to allow pepperoni to soften and the flavors to blend. Serve in hollowed out loaf of bread, surrounded by chunks of bread for dipping. Or with chips.

Ingredients: 8 -12 oz Sirloin, sliced thin (should be about 1 1/2 cups), 1/2 - 1 cup Green Peppers (chopped), 1/2 - 1 cup Onions (chopped, depending on your taste), 8oz Cream Cheese Softened, 1/2 cup of Mayonnaise, 4 oz Shredded/Chopped Provolone Cheese, Olive Oil - for sauteing, Salt and Pepper to taste,
Cooking_Steps: TIR - more here!!

Ingredients: 8 ounces cream cheese - softened 1 cup sour cream 1 teaspoon onion powder 1 teaspoon parsley 3/4 cup dill pickles - drained, finely chopped Dried Meat - optional
Cooking_Steps: Combine cream cheese, sour cream, and seasonings in bowl. Beat until smooth. Stir in pickles (and beef if desired). Cover and chill in refrigerator at least 2 hours. Serve with crackers or fresh vegetables. more at recipetips.com

Ingredients: 3 cans of shredded chicken 3 packages cream cheese 2 cups cheddar cheese 2 cups hot wing sauce
Cooking_Steps: Combine all ingredients in a crock pot. Let warm for roughly 30 to 45 minutes. Eat with chips, crackers, or bread.

Ingredients: 1 cup sour cream 1 cup coco lopez pina colada nonalcoholic drink mix 1/4 cup crushed pineapple 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice
Cooking_Steps: 1 Combine Sour Cream and Coco Lopez in a mixing bowl, and mix together gently. Do not use an electric mixer or over mix by hand as it will cause the sour cream to break down and make sauce too thin. 2 Drain crushed Pineapple. 3 Fold Crushed Pineapple into cream mixture. 4 Finish with juice from one lemon. 5 Cover and store refrigerated.

Ingredients: 4 ounces pina colada mix 3 ounces sour cream 3 ounces drained, crushed pineapple
Cooking_Steps: Mix all ingredients well.

Ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened 2 cups crushed pineapple, drained with juice reserved 1 teaspoon onion powder 2 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed
Cooking_Steps: In a medium bowl, mix together cream cheese, crushed pineapple, onion powder and garlic. Mix in reserved juice from pineapple as desired. Chill in the refrigerator until serving.

Ingredients: 250 g cream cheese 2 (150 g) sour cream 1 (32 g) packet dry onion soup mix 150 g cheese 1 (450 g) can crushed pineapple (drained) 1 (175 g) packet corn chips
Cooking_Steps: 1 Beat the softened cream cheese, with the sour cream, and onion soup mix till well mixed. 2 Stir in the grated cheese and pineapple again mix well. 3 Place in refridgerator until firm enough to hold own shape. 4 Place on a serving plate and mould into hedgehog shape with definite hedgehog nose. 5 Just before serving push corn chips into the dip like the hedgehog bristles. 6 Use grapes, sultanas, raisins or olives for eyes. 7 May need to place extra corn chips and around the hedgehog dip.

Ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice habanero pepper, finrly diced 1 cup sugar 3 tablespoons cinnamon tortilla chips
Cooking_Steps: 1 In saucepan, heat pineapple and hot pepper, sugar, and cinnamon; simmer 5 minutes. 2 Take off heat--chill. 3 Serve with tortilla chips (optional, can do over ice cream. Over ice cream is great if you make it hot, hot, hot.

Ingredients: Pan of drippings from roast turkey breast 3/4 cup dry sherry 1 portobello mushroom, cut into 1/2-inch cubes 1 1/2 to 2 1/4 cups water 3 tablespoons cornstarch mixed with 3 tablespoons water Salt and pepper
Cooking_Steps: Place the pan and its drippings over medium-low heat. Stir in the sherry, scraping and deglazing the pan. Add the mushroom pieces, continuing to stir. As the sauce thickens, add the water, a little at a time, continuing to stir for 3 or 4 minutes. Stir in the cornstarch-water mixture, increase the heat to medium and stir until the gravy thickens. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper, if necessary. Yields 3 cups.

Ingredients: 1 (16oz) container cottage cheese, 1 (16oz) container sour cream, 1 lb (16 oz) package bacon, cooked & chopped (approx. 1 C bacon crumbles), 2 C shredded sharp cheddar, 2 heaping TBSP chives, chopped, 1/4 - 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/4 - 1/2 tsp garlic powder.,
Cooking_Steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In an oven-safe baking dish, combine all the ingredients reserving approximately 1 TBSP chives, 1/4 C chopped bacon, and 3/4 C shredded cheddar. Stir mixture until well combined. Top with remaining cheese and bacon. Bake for 15-20 minutes, until bubbling and melted. Remove from oven, top with remaining chives. Serve warm with french fries, potato wedges, or ruffled potato chips.

Ingredients: 3 c. shredded mozzarella, divided, 2 (8-oz.) blocks cream cheese, softened, 1 c. ricotta, 1/3 c. plus 2 tbsp. freshly grated Parmesan, divided, 1 tbsp. Italian seasoning, 1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes, Kosher salt, 3/4 c. pizza sauce, 1 c. mini pepperoni, 2 (16-oz.) cans refrigerated biscuits (such as Pillsbury Grands), 1/4 c. extra-virgin olive oil, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 tbsp. freshly chopped parsley,
Cooking_Steps: Preheat oven to 350°. In a large bowl, mix together 2 cups mozzarella, cream cheese, ricotta, ⅓ cup Parmesan, Italian seasoning, and red pepper flakes. Season with salt. Transfer mixture to a 9"-x-13" baking dish then spread pizza sauce on top. Top with remaining 1 cup mozzarella and pepperoni. Halve biscuits and roll into balls, then place on top of dip. In a small bowl, whisk together oil, garlic, and parsley. Brush on biscuits and sprinkle with remaining 2 tablespoons Parmesan. Bake until biscuits are golden and cheese is melty, about 40 minutes, then cover with aluminum foil and bake until biscuits are cooked through, another 12-15 minutes. Let cool 10 minutes before serving.

Ingredients: 2 1/2 c ketchup, 1/2 c orange marmalade, 1/2 c brown sugar, firmly packed, 1/2 c apple cider vinegar, 1/2 c water, 1/4 c mustard, spicy brown, 2 Tbsp steak seasoning, 1/2 c onion flakes, dehydrated, 3 clove garlic, minced, 3 Tbsp Worcestershire sauce,
Cooking_Steps: Combine all the ingredients, stir well For the meatballs - just pour it all into a crock pot on HIGH for 3 hours until warm :)

Ingredients: 2 lbs Velveeta cheese 10 ounces rotel (any variety) 4 ounces chopped green chilies 10 3/4 ounces cream of celery soup (you wont taste it) 12 ounces evaporated milk
Cooking_Steps: Mix the last four ingredients together in a large, non-stick pot. I use my dutch oven. 2DO NOT DRAIN any of the veggies. Dump the liquid in along with everything else. 3Cube the velveeta and add to the canned ingredients. 4Cook over low heat until the velveeta melts. 5Stir often. 6This makes a lot! But, it warms up great in the microwave. 7Serve with chips or use to top enchiladas or even use in quesadillas. 8Variation: Try adding some spicy ground meat or canned chili (with or without beans). Add other veggies like black olives or onion, too.

Ingredients: 1 medium ripe avocado, peeled and cubed 1 tablespoon salsa 1 clove garlic, peeled 1/4 teaspoon salt
Cooking_Steps: 1.In a food processor, combine all ingredients; cover and process until smooth. Transfer to a small bowl; serve immediately.

Ingredients: 1/2 cup salsa (Thick and Chunky is best.) 1/2 cup sour cream (Any fat content) 1 tablespoon dry ranch dressing mix
Cooking_Steps: Mix all ingredients together in a small bowl.

Ingredients: 1 1/4 (1.25) lb block White American Cheese (Land OLakes brand preferred), cut into 1-inch cubes 1/4 cup diced green chiles 2 pickled jalapenos, chopped 1 ounce pickled jalapeno juice 2/3 cup whole milk 1/2 cup cold water pinch of cumin (optional)
Cooking_Steps: Toss all ingredients into a large microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high for 5 minutes, stopping to stir after every minute. The mixture might seem watery during the first few stirs, but should come together as a nice runny dip after all the cheese is melted. Serve immediately as a dip with tortilla chips or as a sauce over your favorite Mexican dish. *Recipe Note: White American cheese is found at most deli counters in your local grocery store. *Reheat Instructions: Store any leftover cheese dip in the fridge. Reheat in the microwave, stirring every 30 seconds until creamy and hot.

Ingredients: 3/4 cup bottled salsa, chunky kind 2 teaspoons olive oil 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained
Cooking_Steps: 1 Stir all ingredients together in medium bowl. 2 Cover and chill at least 2 hours.

Ingredients: Soup base cream of celery, chicken or mushroom. Mix in 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 3 tablespoons water and 3 teaspoons lemon juice. Season to taste.
Cooking_Steps: Mix

Ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened 1 (16 ounce) jar salsa, heat of your choice (I prefer Chi Chis Hot) 1 lb sausage (I prefer Jimmy Deans Hot Sausage) tortilla chips
Cooking_Steps: 1 Brown Sausage and drain grease. 2 With electric mixer, combine cream cheese and salsa. 3 Add browned sausage to cream cheese mixture. 4 Microwave until warm. 5 Serve with tortilla chips. Tips: I use a glass casserole dish so your sausage doesnt ruin your tupperware container when warming in microwave. If taking this dip to a gathering, it stays nice in a crock pot on low setting.

Ingredients: 1 lb hamburger or 1 lb breakfast sausage 1/4 cup flour salt & pepper 3 -3 1/2 cups milk (Depends on how thick or thin you like it whole, skim or 2% all work well)
Cooking_Steps: 1 In a large skillett add meat, salt& pepper. 2 Brown really well and do not drain meat unless you are using hamburger and the amount of fat is quite a bit. 3 Sprinkle flour over meat and stir well. 4 Once the flour is mixed in well and browned really well, slowly add milk stirring constantly until nice and thick.

Ingredients: 1/2 cup mayo , 2 tablespoons French Dressing, 4 teaspoons sweet pickle relish , 1 tablespoon finely minced onion , 1 teaspoon white vinegar , 1 teaspoon sugar , 1/8 teaspoon pepper ,
Cooking_Steps: OystersAndPearls.net - more details here (along with a good way to make potato chips!!)

Ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package taco seasoning mix, 1 (16 ounce) can refried beans, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 1 (16 ounce) container sour cream, 1 (16 ounce) jar salsa, 1 large tomato, chopped, 1 green bell pepper, chopped, 1 bunch chopped green onions, 1 small head iceberg lettuce, shredded, 1 (6 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained, 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese,
Cooking_Steps: In a medium bowl, blend the taco seasoning mix and refried beans. Spread the mixture onto a large serving platter. Mix the sour cream and cream cheese in a medium bowl. Spread over the refried beans. Top the layers with salsa. Place a layer of tomato, green bell pepper, green onions and lettuce over the salsa, and top with Cheddar cheese. Garnish with black olives.

Ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can cream of shrimp soup 16 ounces cream cheese 4 ounces cream cheese (lowfat works too) 1 (20 ounce) package frozen baby shrimp 1/4 teaspoon garlic salt
Cooking_Steps: 1 Mix softened cream cheese with soup. 2 Pat excess water from thawed shrimp. 3 Chop into small pieces. 4 Add to cheese mixture, blend in garlic salt. 5 Serve with veggies or crackers

Ingredients: 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 8 ounces medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and roughly chopped, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or more, to taste, 1/4 cup white wine (or chicken stock), 2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice, Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste., 4 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature, 1/4 cup sour cream, 3 tablespoons mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley leaves, 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, divided, 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan,
Cooking_Steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Lightly oil a 9-inch baking dish or coat with nonstick spray. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add shrimp, garlic and red pepper flakes. Cook, stirring occasionally, until pink, about 2 minutes. Stir in wine and lemon juice; season with salt and pepper, to taste. Bring to a simmer; remove from heat and stir in cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, parsley, 1/4 cup mozzarella and Parmesan. Spread mixture into the prepared baking dish; sprinkle with remaining 1/4 cup mozzarella. Place into oven and bake until bubbly and golden, about 10-12 minutes.

Ingredients: 1 tablespoon margarine or corn oil 1 small onion 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1/2 cup plain yogurt 2 to 3 tablespoons curry powder (or to taste)
Cooking_Steps: Peel and slice the onion. Heat oil in a saucepan. Add the onion slices and sautÃ© for a few minutes until tender. Add cream of mushroom soup, yogurt and curry powder. Mix well and cook over very low heat until heated through. Adjust seasonings to taste. Makes 1 1/2 cups.

Ingredients: 6 1/2 ounces canned flaked ham 1 tablespoon sweet pickle relish 2 teaspoons onions, finely chopped or 1/2 teaspoon onion flakes, crushed 4 teaspoons mayonnaise
Cooking_Steps: In a small bowl, mash all ingredients together, adding a bit more mayonnaise if too dry

Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips or milk chocolate chips 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, not evaporated 1/2 cup marshmallow creme 13 ounces graham cracker sticks, one box
Cooking_Steps: 1In a small microwavable bowl, microwave choc. chips and condensed milk on HIGH 1-2 min until chips are melted (Be sure not to burn) mix well. 2Pour into 9" glass pie pan, spreading evenly. 3Drop marshmallow creme by Tablespoonfuls randomly over choc mixture. 4Microwave on HIGH about 30 seconds or until creme is softened. 5Immediatly with knife, make several small swirls through marshmallow and chocolate, creating mabled appearance. 6Serve immediatly with graham sticks for dipping.

Ingredients: 1/2 cup of canola oil 1/3 cup of apple cider vinegar 1/2 cup of ketchup 1/2 cup of fruit juices 1/4 cup of onion 1 hot pepper 1/4 teaspoon of oregano 2 garlic cloves
Cooking_Steps: Combine all ingredients except oil in blender; blend until smooth. Place blended ingredients and oil in saucepan. Boil for 7 to 8 minutes.

Ingredients: 1 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup ketchup, 1/4 cup chili sauce, 1 heaping teaspoon Dijon mustard, 1 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce, 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon Tabasco sauce, 1/4 cup light olive oil, juice of one lemon,
Cooking_Steps: Mix all ingredients well and store in refrigerator overnight.

Ingredients: 3 tablespoons olive oil 4 garlic cloves, minced 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes 2 (28 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with juice 1 1/4 teaspoons salt
Cooking_Steps: 1 Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat. 2 Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden. Be careful not to burn the garlic. 3 Stir in tomatoes and salt. 4 Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes. 5 Serve with pasta.

Ingredients: 8 strips bacon, Two (11 oz) cans whole kernel sweet corn, drained, One jalapeno, seeded and minced, 8 oz cream cheese, softened, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded, 1/2 teaspoon salt, Dash of cayenne pepper, 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped, Parmesan cheese, to taste,
Cooking_Steps: KookMeNow - more here!

Ingredients: 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup ketchup, 2 tablespoons cooked crisp bacon, minced, 2 tablespoons fresh jalapeno, minced,
Cooking_Steps: Mix all ingredients together and serve immediately.... easy nuff!!

Ingredients: 2 mangoes, peeled, pitted and diced 1/2 cup red onion, finely chopped 1/2 red bell pepper, finely chopped 2 jalapeno chilies, seeded and finely chopped 3 tablespoons lime juice
Cooking_Steps: Combine all ingredients and serve

Ingredients: 1 cup mayonnaise 4 chipotle peppers 2 tablespoons adobo sauce
Cooking_Steps: remove 4 chilis from adobo sauce. finely chop, add peppers to mayo. whish or use a food processor to mix. i like to add adobo sauce from the canned chilis to taste. eyeball and keep taste testing to meet your heat likings.

Ingredients: 1/4 cup ketchup 2 tablespoons steak sauce 1 tablespoon cream-style horseradish sauce 1 pinch salt 1 pinch ground black pepper
Cooking_Steps: 1.In a small bowl, mix together the ketchup, steak sauce, horseradish, salt and pepper. Serve with homemade fries or onion rings.

Ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 3/4 cup frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained, 14 oz artichoke heart, 1 can, 8 oz cream cheese, softened, 3/4 cup sour cream, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, divided, 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, salt, to taste, black pepper, to taste, 1 sourdough bread boule,
Cooking_Steps: In a saucepan set over medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of olive oil, garlic and red pepper flakes, stirring until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Stir in the spinach and artichokes. Mix in the cream cheese, sour cream, 1/2 of the mozzarella and Parmesan. Stir until combined and cheese has melted. Season with salt and pepper. Remove from heat and set aside. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Remove the top of the sourdough boule. Cut around the inside of the bread, being careful not to cut through the sides, and scoop out the center of the boule. Cut the scooped out bread into cubes, and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Vertically slice into the edges of the bread bowl, cutting all the way through the bottom, leaving 1 inch (2 cm) of space between each. Place onto a baking sheet next to the cubed bread. Spoon the spinach artichoke mixture into the sliced and hollowed bread bowl. Sprinkle the remaining mozzarella along the edges of the top of the filled bread bowl. Drizzle the cubed bread pieces with the remaining tablespoon of of olive oil. Place the sliced top back onto the bowl. Bake for 15-20 minutes.

Ingredients: 4 teaspoons cornstarch 2 teaspoons soy sauce 1/2 teaspoon ginger 2 tablespoons cooking sherry (or water)
Cooking_Steps: Combine all ingredients and stir

Ingredients: 3/4 cup white sugar 1/3 cup white vinegar 2/3 cup water 1/4 cup soy sauce 1 tablespoon ketchup 2 tablespoons cornstarch
Cooking_Steps: 1.Place the sugar, vinegar, water, soy sauce, ketchup and cornstarch in a medium saucepan, and bring to a boil. Stir continuously until the mixture has thickened.

Ingredients: 2 tablespoons brown sugar 2 tablespoons soy sauce 2 teaspoons cornstarch 1/4 cup vinegar 1/4 cup water 1 cup cubed red bell pepper
Cooking_Steps: Mix all ingredients but red pepper in saucepan. Stirring, bring to a boil. Simmer, stirring now and then, 15 minutes. Add pepper, cook a minute or two. Add cooked chicken or meat - whatever you want to add - and reheat.

Ingredients: 1/4 cup orange blossom honey 3 ounces tequila 1/4 cup lime juice 1/4 cup fresh mint, chopped
Cooking_Steps: Whisk all ingredients together

Ingredients: Homemade recipe HERE if you need one), 4 ounces cream cheese, 2 cups shredded cheese, 1/2 can light beer, 1/3 jar salsa about 1/2 cup, 1/2 cup milk more if needed depending on desired consistency,
Cooking_Steps: On medium heat in a cast iron skillet add ground beef and taco seasoning. A little EVOO may be needed-or a non-stick pan can be used. Cook until no longer pink (depending on the fat content you may need to drain). Use beer to de-glaze the pan. Let alcohol cook out. Add salsa. Cook for 2-3 additional minutes. In a separate saucepan: On medium-low heat, add cream cheese, shredded cheese, and milk. Melt and combine completely. Incorporate cheese sauce to meat mixture. Cook for additional 2-3 minutes. Serve warm as a dip!

Ingredients: 5-6 scallions, sliced 2 red bell peppers, diced 1 (16 ounce) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained 1 (16 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained 1 (16 ounce) can corn, rinsed and drained 1 (16 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained 1 bunch cilantro, chopped finely 3 garlic cloves, minced 3/4 bottle zesty Italian dressing (or more to taste) 3 small hot green peppers, diced very finely. .. (chiles) salt and pepper
Cooking_Steps: Mix all of the ingredients together and add the Italian dressing. Mix well. Refrigerate until served. Can be made ahead of time.

Ingredients: 1 stick unsalted butter, room temperature 1/4 c. powdered sugar 1/4 c. honey 1 tsp. ground cinnamon
Cooking_Steps: Whip the room temperature butter with whisk attachment for 30 seconds. Add powdered sugar, honey and cinnamon and beat until completely combined and very smooth. Scrape down sides of bowl and turn up speed and whip for a minute or two or until really light and fluffy. Makes about 3/4 cup.

Ingredients: 1 tbsp peanut butter, 2 tbsp sesame oil, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tsp sesame seeds
Cooking_Steps: Mix it and throw it on everything!

Ingredients: 1 cup mayonnaise 1/2 cup ketchup 1 cup sweet pickle relish 1 pinch salt 1 pinch ground black pepper
Cooking_Steps: In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, ketchup, relish, salt and pepper until thoroughly combined, and serve.

Ingredients: 4 large tomatoes or 2 lbs roma tomatoes 1 head garlic 1 teaspoon olive oil
Cooking_Steps: 1 Slice tomatoes in half. Slice top 1/2 inch off of garlic to expose cloves. Arrange garlic and tomatoes (cut side up) on foil-lined baking dish. Drizzle olive oil over garlic. (This will keep garlic from drying out and getting bitter.) Sprinkle with salt and pepper. 2 Roast in 350 degree oven for 50-60 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool for easier handling. 3 Pour juice out of tomatoes. Discard juice. Squeeze tomato pulp and roasted garlic into blender or food processor. Dicard tomato skins and garlic paper. Blend or process for 5-10 seconds to obtain a smooth consistency.

Ingredients: 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped (or to taste), 1/2 tablespoon fresh ginger, chopped fine (or to taste), 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 tablespoon rum (or to taste), 1 tablespoon jalapenos (or to taste), 1/2 tsp salt (or to taste),
Cooking_Steps: YoungSunshineCooking - more details and pictures n stuff here :)

Ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can chunk light tuna in water, drained 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened 3 tablespoons salsa
Cooking_Steps: 1.In a small bowl, blend the tuna, cream cheese and salsa. Serve immediately.

Ingredients: Low Fat Cream Cheese Canned Tuna Chipotle Peppers
Cooking_Steps: Mix all together and spread

Ingredients: 2 cups plain yogurt 2 cloves crushed garlic 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper 1/4 cup chopped fresh mint leaves 1 large cucumber - peeled, seeded and shredded
Cooking_Steps: 1.Use a cheese cloth to strain the yogurt over a bowl for 3 to 4 hours, until most of the water has drained. 2.Press excess liquid out of the shredded cucumber. In a medium bowl, stir together the cucumber and strained yogurt. Mix in the garlic, salt, pepper and mint. Chill the mixture for 1 to 2 hours.

Ingredients: 4 avocados - peeled, pitted and sliced 1/2 cup salsa 1/4 tablespoon garlic powder 1/2 teaspoon hot pepper sauce 1 pinch salt (optional)
Cooking_Steps: Place the sliced avocados into a food processor. Set the processor on medium and slowly add salsa until the texture is lumpy. Add the garlic powder and hot sauce. Continue to process until smooth but not too runny. Salt to taste.

Ingredients: 1 tablespoon of butter another 4 tablespoons butter, divided 1/2 cup finely diced onion 4 tablespoons flour 2 cups vegetable broth, low sodium preferred Salt and fresh ground black pepper to taste
Cooking_Steps: In a medium saucepan over medium-low heat, melt one tablespoon of butter. Add the onion and saute for 10 – 15 minutes until soft and light brown. Remove the onion from the pan and place in a small bowl. Set aside. Add the remaining four tablespoons of butter to the saucepan and melt over medium-low heat. Stir in the flour and cook, stirring frequently, for three minutes. Gradually stir in the vegetable broth and continue stirring, over medium-low heat, until thickened to a gravy consistency, about 3 – 4 minutes. Add back the cooked onions. Add salt and pepper to taste and serve.

Ingredients: 8 ounces feta cheese, crumbled and at room temperature 3 ounces whipped cream cheese, at room temperature
Cooking_Steps: Add crumbled feta to a food processor and pulse until small crumbs remain. Add in cream cheese and puree for 4-5 minutes, scraping down the sides when necessary, until feta is super creamy. Serve as desired.

Ingredients: 1/2 cup whiskey (any brand) 1/2 cup brown sugar, packed 1/4 cup olive oil 1/2 tablespoon garlic powder 1/4 cup soy sauce 1 tablespoon salt 1 tablespoon pepper
Cooking_Steps: 1 Place brown sugar in bowl. 2 Add whiskey to brown sugar and mix. 3 Add olive oil to whiskey and brown sugar mixture. 4 Add remaining ingredients. 5 Place meat in air tight container. 6 Pour mixture of meat. 7 Seal in air tight container. 8 Shake container. 9 Place meat with marinade in refrigerator for 3 hours to overnight.

Ingredients: 1 pound White American Cheese 1/2 cup Milk 2 tbs Jalapeno Juice, pickled
Cooking_Steps: Cut the cheese into chunks. Add the milk and juice and simmer till melted (or microwave, carefully, till smooth). Enjoy with tortilla chips or over Mexican food! From listentothemrs.com

Ingredients: 6tbls butter,6 tbls flour,1cup chicken stock,1cup heavy cream, 1 tbl sherry,white pepper to taste
Cooking_Steps: Melt butter,whisk in flour, cook a few minutes until completely combined. Gradually stir in broth & simmer, stir until thickened. Blend in cream, then add sherry. Season to taste. Serve immediatly over chicken, fish or eggs

Ingredients: 1 cup mayonnaise 3 tablespoons white sugar 3 tablespoons rice vinegar 2 tablespoons melted butter 3/4 teaspoon paprika 3/8 teaspoon garlic powder
Cooking_Steps: In a small bowl, combine all the ingredients Mix well. Cover and refrigerate for about 30 minutes.

Ingredients: 1 seedless watermelon 1 1/2 cups rum, or as needed
Cooking_Steps: 1.Rinse the outer rind of the watermelon thoroughly, and pat dry. Set the watermelon in a position so it will not roll over. Press the tip of a funnel through the rind of the melon. If using a plastic funnel, you may need to cut a hole. 2.Situate the melon on a towel in the bottom of the refrigerator or on the counter. Pour rum into the funnel a little at a time, refilling as it seeps into the melon. I start the afternoon before, since we usually leave to go to events in the morning. Allow the melon to marinate at least a few hours, before removing the funnel. Slice just before serving.

Ingredients: 2 cups apple cider 1 cinnamon stick 1 cup vanilla ice cream 1 tbsp. caramel sauce 1 pinch of nutmeg
Cooking_Steps: In small saucepan, heat cider with cinnamon stick. Pour cider into 2 float glasses. Top with ice cream, caramel sauce and some grated nutmeg. Serve with spoon. TIP: It helped me to put the ice cream in the glass first then pour on the cider!

Ingredients: 1 avocado, peeled and seeded 1/3 quart whole milk 3 tablespoons sugar 2 scoops vanilla ice cream
Cooking_Steps: 1 Combine all ingredients together in a blender, and blend well. 2 Pour into nice tall glasses, and garnish with a little whipped cream and a mint sprig. 3 Enjoy

Ingredients: 1.In a blender, combine avocado, sweetened condensed milk, powdered milk, sugar and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
Cooking_Steps: 5 avocados, peeled and pitted 4 tablespoons sweetened condensed milk 1 tablespoon dry milk powder 2 teaspoons white sugar 1/2 cup ice

Ingredients: 1 pkg go frozen strawberries 1 small banana Apple juice
Cooking_Steps: Put frozen strawberries and banana into a blender. Add apple juice to top of fruit. Blend until smooth. You can also add your favorite supplements.

Ingredients: One banana sliced, four heaping tablespoons of Nutella, 1/2 cup Greek yogurt, 16 ice cubes, and whip cream *garnish.
Cooking_Steps: Add all four ingredients into blender until ice is fully blended. Add into glass and add whip garnish.

Ingredients: 2 medium ripe bananas 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained 1 1/2 cups milk 1/2 cup unsweetened sliced fresh strawberries or 1/2 cup sliced frozen unsweetened strawberries 2 tablespoons honey 5 ice cubes whipped topping, for garnish chocolate syrup, for garnish maraschino cherry, for garnish
Cooking_Steps: In a blender, combine the first five ingredients; cover and process until smooth. Gradually add ice, blending until slushy. Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish with whipped topping, chocolate syrup and cherries

Ingredients: 2 cups strawberries, hulled 1 cup orange juice 1 (8 ounce) container strawberry yogurt 2 cups ice 1 banana
Cooking_Steps: In a blender combine strawberries, orange juice, yogurt, ice and banana. Blend until smooth

Ingredients: 2 cups frozen limeade (recipe below) 2 bottles of light beer 1/2 cup tequila Limeade: 1 cup fresh lime juice + 2 limes for zesting 1 1/2 cups of water 1 1/2 cups Splenda sugar blend
Cooking_Steps: To make the limeade: Zest two limes. In a large saucepan, combine water, Splenda and lime zest and heat until Splenda is completely dissolved. Remove from heat and allow to cool at room temperature. Stir in lime juice and freeze your limeade concentrate until ready to use. To make the beer-garitas: In a pitcher, combine frozen limeade, 2 beers and 1/2 cup of tequila. Place pitcher in the freezer overnight until frozen through, then mix so that it is in slushy form and serve. Enjoy! more at eatyourselfskinny.com

Ingredients: 2cups spinach (fresh) 2cups almond milk 1cup strawberries 1cup blueberries 1 banana 1/2 cup almonds
Cooking_Steps: prepare everything night before in zip lock bags 1/2 almonds soak in water overnight Next day mix all cut up ingredients into blender/smoothie maker, blend til desired thickness.

Ingredients: 1 orange 1 lemon 1 lime 1 medium all purpose apples, pared, cored and sliced 1 cup pitted cherries 1 cup fresh pineapple chunks 3/4 cup brandy 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry red wine 1 (12 ounce) can lemon-lime soda to taste 1 cup orange juice to taste
Cooking_Steps: 1. Slice the orange, lemon, and lime into thin rounds. Place the citrus in a pitcher with the apples, cherries, and pineapple. Pour in the brandy and refrigerate for 2 hours of more. Chill the bottle of red wine, lemon-lime soda, and orange juice at the same time. 2. Gently crush the fruits with a spoon, then stir in the red wine, lemon-lime soda, and orange juice. Add additional brandy or orange juice to taste.

Ingredients: 3 tbsp. Cool Whip Free, thawed 1/4 tsp. hot cocoa mix from a 25-calorie packet (like Swiss Miss Diet or NestlÃƒÂ© Fat Free) 1 tbsp. sugar-free French vanilla powdered creamer (like the kind by Coffee-mate) 1/2 cup light vanilla soymilk 1 tbsp. Jell-O Sugar Free Fat Free Vanilla Instant pudding mix 1/4 cup fat-free vanilla ice cream 1 1/2 cups crushed ice or 8 - 12 ice cubes 1 tbsp. rainbow sprinkles, or more for optional topping
Cooking_Steps: To make the chocolatey topping, in a small bowl, combine Cool Whip with cocoa mix. Stir until completely mixed. Cover and refrigerate. In a tall glass, combine powdered creamer with 2 tbsp. hot water and stir to dissolve. Add soymilk and pudding mix. Stir until mostly dissolved. Transfer contents of the glass to a blender. Add ice cream and ice to the blender. Blend at high speed until thoroughly mixed. If needed, remove blender from the base, stir mixture, and blend again. Pour into the tall glass. Gently stir in the sprinkles. If you want to get fancy with your chocolatey topping, spoon it into one of the bottom corners of a plastic bag; snip off the tip of that corner to create a small hole, and pipe the topping through the hole into a swirl over your shake. Or keep things simple and just spoon on the topping! If you like, top with a few extra sprinkles. Enjoy!

Ingredients: 1 (46 fluid ounce) bottle tomato juice 1 1/2 tablespoons celery salt 1 1/2 teaspoons ground black pepper 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce 1 1/2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco„)
Cooking_Steps: In a large jar or bottle, combine the tomato juice, celery salt, pepper, Worcestershire sauce, and hot pepper sauce. Secure the lid and shake, or stir to mix until well blended. Store in the refrigerator for up to one week.

Ingredients: 2 tablespoons of BUTTER 2 tablespoons of BROWN SUGAR 1 cup of MILK 1 teaspoon of VANILLA 1 dash of CINNAMON
Cooking_Steps: 1. Melt the butter and brown sugar (distribut the sugar evenley while stirring) together to make caramel 2. add milk (slowly), then vanilla and stir to combine 3. Then add the cinnamon. 4. Bring to boil, then remove from heat 5. Pour into desired cup (preferrably a mug) and ENJOY!

Ingredients: 1/4 cup evaporated milk 1/8 cup of caramel syrup topping (smuckers is what I used) 2 pumps of liquid caramel (you can find that at starbucks) stir together and put in coffee top with whipped cream (I am estimating the amounts, so do it to taste. I also used Christmas blend coffee and Trader Joes Gingerbread coffee, both made strong and turned out very well
Cooking_Steps: Mix it :)

Ingredients: 1 cup cranberry juice 1 cup grapefruit juice 1 cup sparkling mineral water juice of 1/2 lime
Cooking_Steps: Combine all in a pitcher. Stir, serve over ice with a slice of lime.

Ingredients: A 12 pack of beer
Cooking_Steps: Well, you have no ingredients except beer so really your only option is to get drunk.

Ingredients: one cup of almonds and water
Cooking_Steps: Let the almonds soak in water for 4-8 hours, then drain them and put them in a blender with 4 cups of new and fresh water and mix. Pour the mix into a fine mesh strainer and drain. Store it in the fridge and enjoy! Great to make if someone you know is lactose intolerant or vegan.

Ingredients: 2 frozen bananas, pre-sliced before freezing 1 1/2 Tbsp cocoa powder 1 cup milk 1 Tbsp maple syrup or sugar/sweetener 1 heaping Tbsp peanut butter
Cooking_Steps: Blend in a high power blender for best results.

Ingredients: 2 quarts eggnog, chilled 1 quart orange juice 1 quart vanilla ice cream
Cooking_Steps: Mix it up!

Ingredients: 2 cups cold water 1 cup fresh lime juice 4 teaspoons bottled ground fresh ginger 3/4 cup superfine sugar (if you cant find it, blend granulated sugar until fine) 3 cups sparkling water Lime slices for garnish
Cooking_Steps: Combine cold water, juice and ginger in a blender. Process until fully blended. Line a strainer with cheesecloth. Strain mixture over a pitcher; discard solids. Add sugar to the pitcher, stir until dissolved. Add sparkling water just before serving. Serve over ice. Garnish with lime slices.

Ingredients: 8 ripe kiwis, peeled 2 cups green grapes 2 Granny Smith apples, cored and cut in to large chunks 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice
Cooking_Steps: 1. Slice 2 kiwis crosswise into 1/2 inch thick rounds, then cut each into quarters. Reserve for garnish. 2. Cut remaining 6 kiwis into large pieces. Using an electric juicer, juice kiwis, graps, and apples. 3. Transfer to a pitcher. Stir in lemon juice. Add ice & stir a little. 4. Divide into 4 glasses. Garnish with reserved kiwi and serve immediately.

Ingredients: 250 ml of milk (full cream, skim, almond, oat..the choice is yours!) 1 ripe banana 1 cup strawberries 1/4 cup of oats
Cooking_Steps: Chuck in blender. use blenders magical blending abilities until smooth. thats it!

Ingredients: 1 very ripe peach 4 ounces vodka
Cooking_Steps: 1 cut a very ripe peach in half, remove the pit and squeeze. 2 Strain the juice (about 2 ounces) from the pulp. 3 Add the vodka. 4 Serve straight up or over ice.

Ingredients: 2 cups milk of choice 1/2 tsp pure vanilla extract 2 tsp instant coffee (I use Mt. Hagen decaf, but regular is ok too.) 1/16 tsp salt (dont omit) sweetener, such as 3 nunaturals stevia packets (or 2-3 tablespoons sugar) optional: Whip Cream and Chocolate....if thats even an option :)
Cooking_Steps: Mix the ingredients together in 1 or 2 shallow plastic containers. Freeze. (You could also use an ice cube tray.) Once frozen, pop the blocks out of the containers. Thaw until just soft enough for your blender to be able to handle it. Blend each serving individually, until desired slushiness is reached. Add extra sweetener if needed, but do NOT add ice! It will dilute the flavor. Pour into two glasses and enjoy

Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups diced fresh pineapple 1 banana 1/2 cup greek yogurt 1/2 cup ice 1/2 cup pineapple juice or water.
Cooking_Steps: Throw in a blender til smooth!

Ingredients: 6 eggs 1 (8 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 1 1/2 cups Irish whiskey 1 tablespoon instant coffee
Cooking_Steps: 1Whip eggs in blender; add milk and vanilla. 2Liquify coffee with whiskey, then blend all ingredients.

Ingredients: rendered fat from bacon 1 cup vodka
Cooking_Steps: Render the fat from several pieces of smoked bacon (either in the oven or in a pan on the stove) and when cooled add the rendered fat to a clean mason jar. To this add one cup of premium vodka and let steep for several hours to over night. Place the steeped mixture in the freezer for several hours until the fat freezes and can be removed. Strain the remaining liquid several times first through a tea strainer, then through a coffee filter and then through cheese cloth (in order to remove all solids).

Ingredients: 14 oz sweetened condensed milk 2 cups milk optional flavors 1/3 cup flavored syrup Cocoa Powder Vanilla Extract Almond Extract Cinnamon
Cooking_Steps: Mix it all together - ENJOY! Here are some other flavor combos <ul French Vanilla - 2 teaspoons vanilla extract Chocolate Almond - Cocoa Powder and Almond Extract Strudel Cake - 1 Tblsp Cinnamon, Vanilla, and Almond Extract Cinnamon Cake - 2 Tsp Cinnamon, 2 Tsp Vanilla Extract Almond Joy - 1 tsp Coconut Extract, 1 tsp Almond Extract, 2 tblsp Chocolate Syrup Caramel - Just add Caramel lol Honey Vanilla - 1/4 cup honey, 1 tsp Vanilla (yep...that simple) German Strudel - Equal parts Cinnamon, Vanilla, and Almond So many more flavors, experiment!

Ingredients: 12 medium tomatoes, peeled & cored 2 celery ribs, chopped fine 1/2 cup water 1 teaspoon Tabasco sauce (optional)
Cooking_Steps: 1 Chop the tomatoes fine and process them in a blender or food processor until just juice. 2 Add celery ribs and tabasco (if using) and process further. 3 Put into a saucepan and simmer for 15 minutes add water. 4 Its ready.

Ingredients: Watermelon cantaloup pink papaya honey dew melon 1 banana 3 ice cubes splash of milk
Cooking_Steps: fill blender with an even mix of the fruits listed above add the ice cubes and a splash of milk ( no more than 2tbs ) blend high speed for a 20 secs .. then pulse to the preferd consistency pour into a tall glass and enjoy :) :) good source of hydration and vitamins makes 2 servings

Ingredients: 6-8 cups strong coffee 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk
Cooking_Steps: 1 Combine brewed coffee and sweetened condensed milk in a large pitcher. 2 Refrigerate until chilled. 3 Serve over ice. 4 TIP- Use leftover coffee to make coffee ice cubes with. 5 Then you have the chill without getting watered down.

Ingredients: Marshmallows, Kahlua,
Cooking_Steps: WikiHow - See more here!

Ingredients: 6-8 Strawberries 1 banana 1 cup of Greek or vanilla yogurt 1 cup of orange juice 1/2 cup peanut butter Ice to desired consistency Optional a hand full of chic chips
Cooking_Steps: Put all in blender , mix, enjoy

Ingredients: 1/2 a cucumber, sliced 1 lemon, sliced 1/4 of a peeled and sliced ginger root 1/2 cup mint leaves
Cooking_Steps: Cut everything up and chuck it into a pitcher! Take it easy on the Ginger ;) Detox info: Cucumbers - Give you energy with vitamin B and lots of fiber Ginger - Helps with muscle rejuvenation Lemons - Clean out the "system" Mint - Helps with Digestion you can refill the pitcher for 3-4 days before you have to replace the ingredients. much more at http://www.realityofyou.com/5min-recipe-detoxifying-lemon-water/

Ingredients: 1 cup frozen blueberries 10 oz of lemonade 1 scoop of lemon sorbet optional: protein powder or any kind of health mix
Cooking_Steps: add everything into a blender - blend for 30 secs and serve makes 2 12 oz servings or 1 24 oz

Ingredients: 1 cup original unsweetened almond milk 1 frozen banana 1 Tbsp unsweetened cocoa powder 1 tsp pure vanilla extract 8-10 ice cubes You can add 1 tsp of chia seeds if you like for extra nutrition.
Cooking_Steps: Throw it all in a blender until smooth If youre adding the Chia Seeds, dont worry, once blended you wont even know they are there. read more - rabbitfoodformybunnyteeth.com

Ingredients: 1/2 c. water 1 T. Hersheys cocoa (1g) Dash of salt 1/4 c. heavy cream (0g) 2 T. Torani sugar-free vanilla syrup (0g)
Cooking_Steps: 1) Put water, cocoa, and salt in mug; whisk well and microwave for 1-2 minutes, until hot enough for chocolate to dissolve, but not so hot that chocolate scorches. 2) Add remaining ingredients and whisk until blended.

Ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Malibu Rum 1/2 oz Raspberry Liquor 8 oz Lemonade
Cooking_Steps: Mix it all

Ingredients: 1 cup Milk 1/3 cup Fruit or Veggies
Cooking_Steps: Blend it with Fruits or Veggies

Ingredients: 1 1/2 ounces Kahlua 8 ounces eggnog whipped cream, Reddi-wip nutmeg, ground
Cooking_Steps: Add 1.5 oz. Kahlua to a cup of your favorite eggnog (or 3/4 cup of Kahlua per quart of eggnog). Stir. Top with whipped cream and ground nutmeg. Sit back and enjoy!

Ingredients: 1 apple 1 orange 1/3 cup water
Cooking_Steps: 1 Peel, seed and cut the apple and orange into large chunks. 2 Put the chunks in the blender with the water, and, honey, some sugar, or fake sweeetner, if desired. 3 Blend until it is thick, it takes a minute or two, and I went up to the higest blender setting to get it really smooth. 4 Pour into a glass and have as part of a really healthy breakfast.

Ingredients: Banana Oreos Yogurt Milk
Cooking_Steps: Add at least one banana to a blender. Add a few crumbled oreos. Then add a few heaping spoonfuls of yogurt. Add enough milk to fill most of the blender. Blend away!

Ingredients: Frozen Peaches Lemonade Sprite
Cooking_Steps: Mix all ingredients together - then throw in the freezer

Ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can pineapple tidbits 1 small ripe banana, sliced 3/4 cup fresh or frozen raspberries 2 tablespoons sugar 2 ice cubes
Cooking_Steps: 1.Drain pineapple, reserving juice and 1 cup pineapple (refrigerate remaining pineapple for another use). In a blender, combine the pineapple juice, pineapple, banana, raspberries, sugar and ice; cover and process until smooth. Stir if necessary. Pour into chilled glasses; serve immediately.

Ingredients: 3/4 cup (180 mL) boiling water 1 3-ounce box pineapple Jello gelatin 1/4 cup (60 mL) cold water 1/2 cup (120 mL) vodka 1/4 cup (60 mL) butterscotch schnapps 1/4 cup (60 mL) Irish cream Maraschino Cherries
Cooking_Steps: WikiHow - check out more here!!

Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups coffee, frozen, partially thawed 2 Tbsp. pumpkin, canned 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract 1/4 tsp. pumpkin spice, ground 1 tsp. sweetener (i use stevia) 1/2 cup unsweetened coconut milk From a carton, not canned 2 tbsp. whip cream, fat free 1 dash cinnamon, ground
Cooking_Steps: 1 - In a blender add coffee, pumpkin, vanilla, pumpkin spice, stevia and coconut milk. Blend until smooth. 2 - Pour into a glass and top with whip cream and sprinkle of cinnamon.

Ingredients: 2 cups Vanilla Ice Cream 1 1/4 cups low fat milk 1/4 teaspoon mint extract 8 drops green food coloring
Cooking_Steps: Combine it all in a blender and blend on high speed until smooth. Pour into a cup, top with the whip cream, cherries, etc...Drizzle the glass with chocolate first if you like. Enjoy!

Ingredients: 48 ounce can of tomato juice, or about 6 cups, 3 tablespoons prepared creamy hot horseradish, 3 tablespoons worcestershire sauce, 2 1/4 teaspoons celery salt, 3 teaspoons garlic salt, Tabasco sauce, Freshly ground black pepper, 1 tablespoon celery salt, 1 tablespoon kosher salt,
Cooking_Steps: Mix the tomato juice, horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, celery salt, garlic salt and black pepper in a large pitcher. Season with 10-15 shakes of Tabasco sauce, or to taste. Refrigerate until ready to serve. To assemble drinks, mix the celery salt and kosher salt on a small plate. Dip the rim of your glass in a shallow amount of water, then dip into the salt mix and twist. Fill an 8 ounce glass to the top with ice. Add 2 ounces of vodka then top with Bloody Mary tomato mixture.

Ingredients: 2 1/2 cups white sugar 6 cups water 2 (3 ounce) packages strawberry flavored gelatin mix 1 (46 fluid ounce) can pineapple juice 2/3 cup lemon juice 1 quart orange juice 2 (2 liter) bottles lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
Cooking_Steps: In a large saucepan, combine sugar, water, and strawberry flavored gelatin. Boil for 3 minutes. Stir in pineapple juice, lemon juice, and orange juice. Divide mixture in half, and freeze in 2 separate containers. 2. When ready to serve, place the frozen contents of one container in a punch bowl, and stir in 1 bottle of lemon-lime soda until slushy.

Ingredients: strawberries whip cream vanilla wafers yogurt ice sugar water
Cooking_Steps: add all ingredients into blender, blend! :-)

Ingredients: What youll need: 1 avocado, peeled and pitted 3/4 cup orange juice(fresh is best but can also use store bought) 1/3 carrot juice 1/2 cup frozen strawberries, (not thawed)
Cooking_Steps: The how to: Puree avocado, orange juice, carrot juice, and strawberries in a blender until smooth. Enjoy! :)

Ingredients: 5 Strawberries (fresh or frozen) 1 Banana 1 cup Pineapple Chunks (fresh, frozen or can which ever you prefer) 1/2 cup Pineapple Juice 1/2 Lemon or Lime Thumb size of Ginger 1/2 medium size Cucumber
Cooking_Steps: Place the all the ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Then drink and enjoy a refreshing tasty smoothie.

Ingredients: 1/2 lb of fresh strawberries 1 apple 1 ounce of fresh whole basil leaves 1 bottle of Chardonnay 1/2 cup sugar 1 cup of club soda 1 cup of white grape juice
Cooking_Steps: 1. Trim and thinly slice the strawberries. 2. Slice and dice the apple into very small bits. 3. Score the basil leaves with a fork. I did this instead of cutting the leaves into strips as I did not want my guests choking on basil while trying to enjoy this drink. Simply just rub the basil leaves gently with a fork in order to release their flavor in the sangria. 4. Layer the fruit, sugar and basil in a large pitcher and let sit for about 10 minutes. This is just to let the sugar absorb the juices from the basil and the fruit. You’ll see it turn a bit red. 5. Add the club soda first and then the remaining liquids. Stir well and serve.

Ingredients: 1/2 l of milk 1-2 bananas/ 5-10 strawberries (depends how strong flavor you like and how thick you want it to be) 4-8 tea cookies 1-3 tablespoons of sugar
Cooking_Steps: putt all ingredients in blender. add bananas/strawberries and cookies depending on how strong flavor you like and how thick you want it to be. add sugar depending on how sweet you want it (if you go with bananas, you wont need much sugar cause theyre sweet enough. if you go with strawberries add more sugar cause it would be a bit sour and less sweet). if its a hot summer day you can add ice cubes in blender and mix it up with other ingredients. you will get cold, refreshing and very nutritious drink.

Ingredients: Ice Cubes 1 oz. fresh lemon juice 1 oz. simple syrup 2 oz. Triple Sec 3 oz. Sangiovese (Try Trio Vintners The RIOT) lemon twist garnish
Cooking_Steps: Everything goes in the shaker but the lemon twist. Put those in two charming chilled glasses. Shake! Pour contents into the glasses and enjoy! p.s. Need to know how to make simple sugar? Ok, dissolve 1.5 cups sugar into 2 cups water. Bring to boil, reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat, cool completely and store in tight container in the fridge.

Ingredients: 2 c. almond or refrigerated coconut milk 1/3 c. granulated sugar 1 vanilla bean 1 tsp. vanilla
Cooking_Steps: 1.Combine almond milk and sugar in a large saucepan. Slice open vanilla bean lengthwise and scrape insides into saucepan, then place empty vanilla bean into mixture. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, whisking to break up clumps of vanilla. Once mixture has come to a simmer, reduce heat to low and cook 10 minutes more, whisking occasionally. 2.Allow vanilla mixture to come to room temperature. Pour through a fine mesh strainer into a bowl with a spout, then pour mixture into ice cube trays. Freeze until completely solid, 3-4 hours (depending on the temperature of your freezer and size of the cubes). Serve with iced coffee, tea, or other beverages. Quick version: you can cut out the vanilla bean and just use the extract, the bean gives a little more natural flavor - but the concept is still the same More at ohmyveggies.com

Ingredients: 1.Freeze 1 cup watermelon for garnish. Puree the remaining 4 cups watermelon. Strain; divide the juice among 4 ice-filled glasses. 2.Top each with 1 1/2 ounces gin, 2 tablespoons lime juice and 1/3 cup ginger ale. Garnish with the frozen watermelon and lime wedges. Non-alcoholic variation: Omit the gin.
Cooking_Steps: 5 cups diced watermelon, divided 6 ounces gin, divided 8 tablespoons lime juice, divided 1 1/3 cups ginger ale, divided Lime wedges, for garnish

Ingredients: Watermelon Tequila Salt Lime
Cooking_Steps: Slice watermelon and soak in tequila for at least an hour. Dip in course salt, squeeze a little lime. Portable margarita!

Ingredients: 3/4 cup orange juice, 1/2 cup lemon juice, 1/3 cup lime juice, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup soy sauce, 1 teaspoon finely chopped canned chipotle pepper, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 tablespoon ground cumin, 1 tablespoon paprika, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 tablespoon black pepper, 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped, 1/2 cup olive oil, 3 pounds flank steak,
Cooking_Steps: Combine the orange, lemon, and lime juice in a large glass or ceramic bowl along with the garlic, soy sauce, chipotle pepper, chili power, ground cumin, paprika, dried oregano, black pepper, and cilantro. Slowly whisk in the olive oil until marinade is well combined. Remove one cup of the marinade and place in a small bowl, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for use after the meat is cooked. Place the flank steak between two sheets of heavy plastic (resealable freezer bags work well) on a solid, level surface. Firmly pound the steak with the smooth side of a meat mallet to a thickness of 1/4 inch. After pounding, poke steak all over with a fork. Add the meat to the marinade in the large bowl, cover, and allow to marinate in the refrigerator for 24 hours. Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate. Remove the steak from the marinade and grill to desired doneness, about 5 minutes per side for medium rare. Discard used marinade. Remove meat from heat and slice across the grain. Pour the one cup of reserved, unused marinade over the hot meat and serve immediately.

Ingredients: 8 ounces flank steak, sliced against the grain into 1/4-inch thick slices, 1 teaspoon oil, 1 teaspoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, plus 1/4 cup, 1/3 cup vegetable oil, for frying the beef , 1/2 teaspoon minced ginger, 5 dried red chili peppers (optional), 2 cloves garlic, chopped, 1/4 cup low sodium soy sauce, 1/4 cup water or low sodium chicken stock, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, mixed with 1 tablespoon water, 2 scallions, cut into 1-inch long slices on the diagonal,
Cooking_Steps: Marinate the beef for 1 hour in 1 teaspoon oil, 1 teaspoon soy sauce, and 1 tablespoon cornstarch. Dredge the meat in the remaining 1/4 cup of cornstarch until lightly coated. Heat 1/3 cup oil in the wok over high heat. Just before the oil starts to smoke, spread the flank steak pieces evenly in the wok, and let sear for 1 minute (depending upon the heat of your wok). Turn over and let the other side sear for another 30 seconds. Remove to a sheet pan; tilt it slightly to let the oil drain to one side (lean it on a cookbook or cutting board). The beef should be seared with a crusty coating. Drain the oil from the wok, leaving 1 tablespoon behind, and turn the heat to medium-high. Add the ginger and dried chili peppers, if using. After about 15 seconds, add the garlic. Stir for another 10 seconds and add the soy sauce and chicken stock (or water). Bring the sauce to a simmer, add the brown sugar, and stir until dissolved. Let the sauce simmer for about 2 minutes and slowly stir in the cornstarch slurry mixture--until the sauce coats the back of a spoon. Add the beef and scallions and toss everything for another 30 seconds. There should be almost no liquid as the sauce should be clinging to the beef. If you still have sauce, increase the heat slightly and stir until thickened. Plate and serve with hot steamed rice!
