<ul Cook jumbo pasta shells/boil until soft In a large bowl, mix cream cheese with crab meat In a medium sauce pan, mix whipping cream with half a cup of ketchup, 4 tbsp of onion powder, 1 tbsp of garlic salt, 1 tbsp of ginger, and three dashes of red pepper When shells are done, stuff with cream cheese and crab mix and place in glass pan (spray with Pam first) Then pour the sauce over the stuffed shells Top the shells with shrimp Cover with mild cheddar grated cheese and panko crumbs Heat in oven for 20 or until top is golden brown on 375 And last, enjoy! :)

Ingredients: 8 ounces lo mein egg noodles (spaghetti works in a pinch), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 2 cups mushrooms, sliced, 1 red bell pepper, julienned, 1 carrot, julienned, 1/2 cup snow peas (optional), 3 cups baby spinach, FOR THE SAUCE2 tablespoons reduced sodium soy sauce, or more, to taste, 2 teaspoons sugar, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger, 1/2 teaspoon Sriracha, or more, to taste,
Cooking_Steps: GooodRecipes - more here!!

Ingredients: 1 16oz box pasta (shells, macaroni, bow tie) I used 3/4 or 12 oz for this recipe , 4 Tablespoons butter , 1 can cheddar cheese soup (10 3/4 oz) , 1 can evaporated milk (12 oz) , 1-2 cups grated cheddar cheese , Salt and pepper to taste or seasoned salt ,
Cooking_Steps: CleverCraftyCookinMama.com - more details here!

Ingredients: 2/3 cup olive oil, 10 cloves garlic, sliced very thin or minced, 1 1/2 teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes (add a little more if you really like the spice!), 2 1/2 cups tomato puree, 1/2 cup fresh basil leaves, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup fresh mint leaves, roughly chopped, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, roughly chopped, 2 teaspoons salt, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1 pound of spaghetti, cooked al dente,
Cooking_Steps: While your pasta is cooking, make your sauce! Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium flame. Add garlic and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently, until garlic is fragrant and just starting to turn golden. Add crushed red pepper, and stir. Add tomato puree, stir, and reduce heat to medium. Let cook for 8 minutes – stirring occasionally – or until the oil beings to rise and separate from the tomato puree. Mix in fresh herbs, salt, and pepper; taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Once pasta is cooked and drained, add it to the sauce and and stir to coat the noodles. Reduce heat to low, cover pan, and let pasta cook in the sauce for 2-3 minutes. Serve pasta with cheese, and eat at once! submitted by BakerbyNature.com - more details and original recipe here!

Ingredients: About 1/4 cup of cooked spaghetti sauce, 1 cooked lasagna noodle, 1/4 Cup shredded Mozzarella cheese, 2 Tablespoons Ricotta Cheese (Cottage cheese works great too), 2 Tablespoons chopped, cooked hamburger and/or sausage (optional) ,
Cooking_Steps: <ul Gather all ingredients first. To make one serving in a ramekin - on paper plate lay noodle flat. Use a paper towel to gently dry noodle. Spoon Ricotta and half the Mozzarella in the center along the length of it. You can roll a few spinach leaves up in it too if you like, yum! Roll noodle up loosely to contain ingredients. Transfer to ramekin with a large spoon. Pour spaghetti sauce over the top and sprinkle remaining Mozzarella over the top. Bake at 350 20-25 min. or until cheese is browned. Amount of ingredients is approximate, everyone has different taste. Just make sure the pasta is covered with sauce or cheese or it will get hard in the oven.

Ingredients: , 1 cup chopped onion , 1 cup chopped green bell pepper , 1 28 oz can tomatoes, undrained , 1 cup water , 12 oz broken spaghetti , 1 1/2 tsp Italian seasoning , 1 tbsp balsamic vinegar or Red wine vinegar , 1 Pinch of salt , 2 cups light shredded Mozzarella cheese , 1/4 cup light grated Parmesan cheese , Chopped fresh basil, (optional) ,
Cooking_Steps: EasyRecipes - more here!

Ingredients: 16 ounces dry pasta, 3 tablespoons butter, 2-3 cloves garlic, minced, 3 tablespoons flour, 1 cup chicken broth, 2 cups half and half, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, 2 cups mozzarella cheese, divided, 1-2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 1 (12 oz) fully cooked smoked sausage, any variety,
Cooking_Steps: MyCookingHome - more here!

Ingredients: 1 pound box dried lasagna noodles, 19 ounce can Red Enchilada Sauce, 8 ounces cream cheese, 1 1/2 cups chopped cooked chicken (use up leftovers), 15 ounce can black beans, drained, 1 heaping cup chopped bell pepper, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 2 1/2 cups shredded mexican blend cheese, divided, 1/2 cups chopped scallions, 1 Taco Seasoning Packet,
Cooking_Steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Coat a 9 X 13 inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. Set a large pot of salted water over high heat, and bring to a boil. Once boiling, cook the lasagna noodles according to the package instructions. Once cooked to al dente, lay them out on a clean tea towel. Meanwhile, place the Red Enchilada Sauce in the blender and add the cream cheese. Blend until smooth. Pour half of the cheese sauce into the baking dish. In a large bowl, mix the cooked chicken, black beans, bell peppers, garlic, 2 cups shredded cheese, scallions, and taco seasoning. Spread the mixture evenly over 12 lasagna noodles. Roll each noodle, tucking bits back into the rolls if they fall out. Place the rolls in the baking dish. Once all the rolls are in the dish, pour the remaining sauce over the top. Bake for 30-35 minutes, then sprinkle the remaining cheese over the top. Garnish with chopped scallions or cilantro if desired.

Ingredients: Recipe HERE if you need one), 12 Meatballs (cooked) Homemade recipe HERE if you need one,
Cooking_Steps: Bake meatballs according to package directions and set aside (keep warm). Keep oven preheated to 375 degrees. Grease or spray a 12-cup regular size muffin pan with nonstick cooking spray. Set aside. While meatballs are baking, cook spaghetti noodles according to package directions. Drain and toss in a bowl with olive oil; Allow to cool for about 5-10 minutes. *You want the noodles to be cool enough for you to touch without getting burned. Toss the cooled spaghetti noodles with 1 cup Mozzarella cheese, 3 tablespoons of spaghetti sauce and egg. Evenly divide spaghetti between the 12 muffin cups, pressing noodles in each cup to create a small indention in the middle. (The indentions will be “nests” for the meatballs) Bake for 15 minutes and remove from oven. Top each “nest” with 1 tablespoon warm spaghetti sauce, add a meatball, and top with 1 more tablespoon spaghetti sauce. Carefully take each spaghetti and meatball muffin out of its cup and serve.

Ingredients: For the Crust: 4 cups cooked spaghetti , 1/3 cup melted butter , 2 large eggs , 1/2 cup parmesan cheese , Filling: 3/4 cup cottage cheese, 1/4 cup Parmesan, Sauce: (if you need a recipe) 2 Tablespoons olive oil , 1 pounds lean hamburger or sausage , 1/2 tsp crushed dried basil , 1/2 tsp garlic powder , 1/2 tsp onion powder , 1/2 tsp red pepper seeds , 1/2 tsp salt , pepper to taste , 1 15 oz can tomato sauce , 1 cup Mozzarella Cheese ,
Cooking_Steps: Sauce Instructions (again... if you need one) Pour olive oil into pan, add meat and seasonings. Brown and Drain Add tomato sauce. Stir and simmer 10 minutes Spoon evenly over spaghetti nests Top each with mozzarella cheese. Bake approximately 30 minutes until cheese is lightly browned. from Edenseats - more here!

Ingredients: Red Sauce Recipe Here if you need it, White Sauce Recipe HERE if you need it, , Meatballs (Store bought or your favorite recipe) Again... Easy Meatball Recipe here if you need one :), , Olive Oil, Parmesan Cheese,
Cooking_Steps: Spoon a little MORE Pasta Sauce on top Top with MORE cheese and bake for 20 minutes at 375F Enjoy!! Full step by step video instructions here if you need em!!

Ingredients: SPICY CREAM SAUCE 2 tbsp. butter, 2 tbsp. flour, 2 c. half & half, 1/4 tsp. of red pepper flakes, 1 c. Feta cheese (Or Parmesan),
Cooking_Steps: Make your Sauce: In the same pan you cooked the chicken and veggies in, melt the butter over medium heat. Toss in the flour and stir, cooking 1-2 minutes. (We are making a roux) Slowly add in the half and half while stirring to prevent any clumps from forming. Sprinkle in the red pepper flakes and allow to simmer until you see boiling action. Stir periodically. When your sauce begins to thicken and bubble, turn off the heat and add in your cheese. Stir until melted. To assemble everything - add the pasta first so it gets nice and coated with sauce and then toss the Chicken and Veggies in!! from GoooodRecipes - more here!

Ingredients: For the pasta: 4 large eggs 1 tablespoon water 3 ½ cups all purpose flour ½ teaspoon salt For the spinach and cheese filling: ½ medium onion, minced 1 tablespoon olive oil ¾ cup ricotta cheese 3/4 cup Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, freshly grated ¼ cup mozzarella cheese, shredded 1 large egg yolk Salt and pepper, to taste 1 bunch of fresh spinach-wash and remove stems (about 1 pound ) or use frozen chopped spinach ( 10 oz .)
Cooking_Steps: Steps to yummy goodness: For the pasta: 1. Place eggs, water, flour, and salt in mixing bowl (counter works great as well) 2. Mix / knead for two minutes. Remove dough from bowl and hand knead for 1-2 minutes. 3. Let it rest for 20 minutes. Divide the dough into four pieces before processing with the pasta roller. 4. Roll out pasta the dough should be paper-thin, about 1/8-inch thick (you should almost be able to see your hand through it). 5. Set aside while getting the filling ready. For the filling: 1. Place damp spinach leaves in a large skillet over medium heat. Cover with a lid and let the leaves wilt. Once wilted let cool and then chop. 2. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a small skillet. Add the onion and cook over medium heat, until translucent. Stir in the spinach and salt to taste. Cook for about one minute. 3. Transfer the spinach mixture to a medium bowl. Stir in ricotta, Parmigiano-Reggiano, mozzarella, and the egg yolk. Mix well and set aside. 4. Lay out your long sheets of pasta on a lightly floured table. Place small balls of filling, about 1 teaspoon, in a line about one inch from the bottom of the pasta sheet. Leave about 1 1/4 inches between each ball of filling. Fold over the top of the pasta sheet, lining it with the bottom edge. Seal the bottom and 2 open sides with your finger. Use a ravioli cutter to cut out the individual raviolis. Place the ravioli on a large plate. 5. Boil a huge pot of water with salt. Add in the ravioli and cook for about 5-6 minutes. Strain and serve with the sauce of your choice. .: Side Notes :. If you have a Kitchen Aid Mixer you can use that to mix the pasta dough just make sure to use the hook attachment and keep the speed on low Feel free to add any herbs you like to the filling, when I want to change things up I normally add a little basil, rosemary or whatever else I have on hand.

Ingredients: 2 and 1/2 cups uncooked penne rigate, 2 chicken breasts, salt and pepper (to taste), 2 Tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup sour cream (or Greek yogurt), 4 oz. cream cheese, softened, 1/4 cup half and half or whole milk, 1 pkg dry Ranch mix, 5 oz. frozen spinach or half of a batch of fresh, 1 and 1/4 cup shredded mozzarella cheese,
Cooking_Steps: Head to CrunchyCreamySweet.com HERE for the full recipe!!

Ingredients: 14 ounces elbow macaroni (or other pasta), 6 tablespoons butter, divided, 16 ounces sirloin steak, cut into small pieces, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, minced, 4 tablespoons flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 cups milk, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, 3/4 cup water or broth (only if needed),
Cooking_Steps: Make Your Pasta: Cook the pasta according to package directions. Drain and set aside (toss with oil to prevent sticking). Make Your Steak: Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a large, sturdy skillet over medium low heat. Continue to heat the butter until its barely browned (this just gives it more flavor). Turn the heat up to medium high and add the steak pieces - do not stir or shake for 30-45 seconds. Flip the steak pieces and cook for another minute or two, until the steak is done to your liking. Remove from heat and keep warm. Make Your Sauce: Melt the remaining butter over medium heat. Add the garlic and parsley - saute for about a minute, being careful not to burn or brown the garlic. Add the flour and salt - saute for another minute or two. Add the milk slowly, whisking to incorporate with the flour/butter mixture. Simmer for 10-15 minutes until the sauce is bubbling and has thickened slightly. Add the cheese and stir until melted. And Assemble: Stir the pasta together with the cheese sauce and add the steak. Stir in extra water or broth if the consistency needs a little thinning out. Season with Salt and Pepper. from MitEasyRecipes - more here!!

Ingredients: 1 Loaf Bread Dough or 12 Dinner Rolls, thawed to room temperature (I used Rhodes Bread Dough) , 6 oz spaghetti, cooked , 1 cup thick spaghetti sauce (whatever kind you like) , 8 oz mozzarella cheese, cut into 1/2 inch cubes , 1 egg white , Parmesan cheese , Parsley flakes , Garlic Powder , Melted Butter ,
Cooking_Steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and let cool slightly. Remove wrap from dough. Place spaghetti lengthwise in a 4-inch strip down the center of dough. Tip with sauce and cheese cubes. (I mixed my spaghetti and sauce together and added a 1/2 pound of cooked Italian Sausage) Make cuts 1 1/2-inches apart on long sides of dough to within 1/2-inch of filling. Begin braid by folding top and bottom strips toward filling. Then braid strips left over right, right over left. Finish by pulling last strip over and tucking under braid. Lift braid with both hands and place on large sprayed baking sheet. (or transfer parchment paper to baking sheet). Brush with egg white and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese, parsley, garlic powder, maybe even a little oregano Bake at 350 for 30-35 minutes or until golden brown. Brush with melted butter, Cool slightly and slice to serve. from MgeertsRecipes - more here!

Ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 1 (1 1/4 ounce) package taco seasoning (can use low-sodium), 1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, 14 -16 large pasta shells, 1 cup salsa, 1 cup taco sauce, 1 cup cheddar cheese, shredded, 1 cup Monterrey jack cheese, shredded, 1 1⁄2 cups tortilla chips, crushed (optional), 3 green onions, chopped, 1 cup sour cream,
Cooking_Steps: GoodRecipes - more here!

Recipe_Name: Sweet Crispy Chicken Mac and Cheese
Ingredients: good recipe HERE if you need one), 5 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled, Salt and Pepper, Basil HONEY PEPPER SAUCE , 3/4 cup honey, 1/3 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 1/4 cup pineapple juice, Juice of 1 lemon, 1 Tbs vinegar, 1 tsp black pepper, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper, 1/4 tsp garlic powder, Dash of paprika CHEESE SAUCE , 1 stick butter, 2 cups heavy cream, 1/2 cup parmesan cheese, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, 3/4 cup colby jack cheese, 2-3 cloves minced garlic,
Cooking_Steps: class="blog-yumprint-methods" Bake or deep fry chicken strips until done (you can also make your own), set aside. Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile in medium saucepan mix all your Honey Pepper sauce ingredients and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes or until thickened, stirring often.. To make your cheese sauce melt your butter and cream together in medium sauce pan. Once melted add your cheese and garlic and stir until combined and reduce heat until all cheeses are blended in. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add pasta to large bowl and pour sauce and crumbled bacon over top, stir to combine. Dip each of your chicken strips into the honey pepper sauce until coated. Set aside. When ready to serve, dish up your pasta and top with chicken strips and sprinkle with basil. > NOTES class="blog-yumprint-notes" If sauce doesnt thicken naturally for you mix together 1 Tbs cold water and 1 Tbs cornstarch and mix into sauce and heat, should thicken after that. Keep eye on sauce while cooking, it can boil over if not stirred enough or heat is too high. >

Ingredients: SAUCE:, 1/2 cup of mayonnaise, 1/2 cup Thai sweet chili sauce (in the asian isle), 2 cloves garlic, minced, 2 Tablespoons of lime juice, 1/4 tsp of crushed red pepper flakes, 1/2 tablespoon onion powder,
Cooking_Steps: In a large bowl, mix all sauce ingredients together then set aside. Cook pasta, drain. Place the uncooked shrimp OR chicken in a medium bowl, add the paprika, 3 cloves of garlic, pepper In a large skillet, on medium high heat, add the coated uncooked shrimp OR chicken. Stir constantly while cooking until no longer pink about 10 minutes Remove from heat and set aside. In a large bowl, combine the pasta, shrimp/chicken and sauce mixture and toss WELL. ENJOY!

Ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 1 med zucchini, 1 med sweet potato, 2 turnips, 2 carrots , 1 jar favorite pasta sauce,
Cooking_Steps: <ul In pan cook your ground beef. While that is cooking use a veggie spiralizer - large noodle option- and make your "noodles" **I Used the ones listed above - but you can really experiment and make the ones you like best** Once beef is browned, add in a rinsed can of black beans, the pasta sauce of your choice and veggie noodles. Cook for another 15-20 minutes over medium high heat, stirring occasionally.

Ingredients: 1 pkg Veggie Pasta noodles (or more) , 16oz Wish Bone Italian Dressing, 2 fresh Tomato , 1 or 2 heads fresh Broccoli , 1 small Green Bell pepper , 1 small Red Bell pepper , 1 small Onion , 1 can Black olives , 1 fresh cucumber ,
Cooking_Steps: <ul Cook pasta until just about done. Dont cook pasta to long, it will get mushy. Drain pasta and cool off under cold water. Wash veggies and cut into small bites. Slice olives. (you could buy the olives that are all ready sliced) Mix pasta and veggies. Add dressing to taste. I like a lot of it. Refrigerate until chilled.

Ingredients: , 1 envelope country gravy mix (easy scratch recipe HERE if you need one) , 6 eggs , 2 tablespoons milk , 1/2 teaspoon salt , 1/4 teaspoon pepper , 1 tablespoon butter , 8 oz shredded cheddar cheese , 4 oz shredded pepper Jack cheese ,
Cooking_Steps: Heat oven to 375. Separate crescent dough into 16 triangles and place on a greased, round pizza pan with points toward the center. Press onto the bottom and up the sides of pan to form a crust; seal seams. Bake for 11-13 minutes or until golden brown. Meanwhile, cook your sausage and prepare your gravy (again - recipe HERE if you need one) In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, salt and pepper. In a large skillet, heat butter over medium heat. Add egg mixture; cook and stir until almost set. Spread sausage gravy mixture over the crust. Top with eggs and cheeses. Bake 5-10 minutes longer or until eggs are set and cheese is melted. Slice and Serve!! from LeClubCookingChef - more here!!

Ingredients: pineapple broccoli florets pepperoni bacon feta shredded mozzarella shredded extra old cheddar pizza dough Sauce
Cooking_Steps: Pre-cook bacon strips. Blend shredded cheeses together by hand. Lay out pizza dough on pan, and spread bbq sauce. Spread 1/2 shredded cheese on dough. Add half the bacon, pepperoni and all of the broccoli and pineapple. Add 1/4 of the remaining shredded cheese and crumble the feta over top. Add remaining bacon and pepperoni then the remaining Cheese. Cook for 30-45 mins at 350 degrees, or until cheeses have melted and browned.

Ingredients: 1 pkg dry yeast 1 1/3 c warm water (110 to 115 degrees) 1 t sugar 3 1/2 c unbleached flour 1 c cake flour 1 1/2 t salt 1 c plus 2 T olive oil 3 t minced garlic (1) 15-oz can tomato sauce (1) 12-oz can tomato paste 2 t oregano 2 t basil 2 c sliced mushrooms Salt and pepper 1 lb Italian sausage (hot or sweet) 1/2 t crushed fennel seeds 2 T butter 8 c blanched, roughly chopped broccoli 1 T shortening 3 1/2 c grated mozzarella cheese 1/2 c grated Parmesan cheese
Cooking_Steps: Dissolve yeast in warm water; stir in sugar. Combine flours and salt, and gradually add the dissolved yeast and 1/4 cup of the oil. Knead until the texture is smooth. Put in a large bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and let rise until triple in bulk (2-3 hours). Meanwhile, prepare the fillings. Heat 1/4 cup of the oil in a saute pan, add 2 t garlic, and cook for 30 seconds (without browning.) Stir in the tomato sauce and paste, simmer until thickened. Stir in basil and oregano, set aside to cool. Head 2 T of the oil and saute the mushrooms until lightly browned and the liquid is evaporated. Season to taste, and set aside to cool. Remove and discard the casings from sausage, crumble and add the sausage to the pan along with fennel. Cook thoroughly, remove and cool. Heat the butter and 2 T of the oil; at 1 t of garlic and stir for 30 seconds. Stir in the broccoli until coated well and any liquid is evaporated. Season to taste; set aside. When the dough has risen, punch down. Cut off about 2/5 of it and set aside. Grease a 14 x 1 1/2" deep-dish pizza pan with the shortening. On a floured board, roll out 3/5 of the dough to a 20" circle. Fit to the pan, letting the excess dough hang over the side. Brush the dough with 1 T of the oil; sprinkle with salt. Sprinkle 1 c of the mozzarella over the dough. Spread the tomato sauce across the cheese, spread the mushrooms over the tomatoes, and cover with 1 c of mozzarella. Roll out the remaining dough to approximately a 14" circle. Brush the sides of the dough inside the pan with water. Fit the 14" round into the pan. Press edges (pull if necessary) against the moistened dough to seal it. Trim the overhanging dough to 1/2" and wet it again. Fold inward and crimp to form a raised rim around the pan edge. Cut a steam vent in the top layer of the dough, and brush with 1 T of the oil. Spread the sausage across the dough and cover with the broccoli. Combine the remaining cheeses and sprinkle across the broccoli; drizzle with 1/4 c of oil. Bake in a preheated 425 degree oven for 30-40 minutes. Freezes well. Ideas: put the broccoli and sausage on the lower layer, and the tomatoes and mushrooms on the top layer. This way the broccoli stays moist. For a vegetarian pizza, replace the sausage with 4 c sliced onions, lightly browned in 2 T oil. Or, you can keep the sausage and add the onions anyway.

Ingredients: Pizza Dough Recipe: ½ cup milk, 1 cup water, 2 Tbsps. vegetable oil, 2 tsps. salt, 2 tsps. sugar, 4 cups all-purpose flour, 4 tsps. fast rise yeast, 2 Tbsps. Cornmeal, Sauce Recipe: ¼ cup prepared mustard, ¾ cup ketchup, Cheeseburger Pizza Topping: 8 slices bacon cut into 1 pieces, ½ lb. ground beef, 1 tsp. steak spice, 1 tsp. dry mustard, 1 tsp. garlic powder, 1 tsp. onion powder, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, ½ tsp. pepper omit salt because of steak spice and bacon, 1 small onion, sliced, 1 cup Marble cheese, grated, 1 cup Mozzarella cheese, grated,
Cooking_Steps: Directions for the Pizza Dough: <ul Place all ingredients into bread pan in order listed; select pizza dough setting. If your bread machine doesn’t have a pizza dough setting then select dough setting, and when dough is done, place on lightly floured surface and cover with plastic wrap; let rise in warm place for 30 minutes. Sprinkle two 12” medium pizza pans with cornmeal. Divide dough into 2 balls and roll each dough ball into a circle with rolling pin until it is slightly larger than the pan. Place dough into pizza pans and pinch sides to form a crust. If you desire a thick crust pizza, cover it with a towel and let rise for another 30 minutes. If not, then proceed with the sauce and toppings. Directions for the Sauce: Mix mustard and ketchup in a bowl and set aside Directions for the Cheeseburger Pizza Toppings: <ul In medium skillet, cook bacon until browned. Remove and drain on paper towels. Wipe skillet clean and fry ground beef. Add seasonings, taste and adjust. When cooked through, remove from heat and drain any fat. Let cool slightly. Spread a generous amount of sauce onto each pizza – you may not need to use it all. Sprinkle with ground beef, bacon and sliced onions. Top with grated cheeses. Bake in preheated oven at 450 for 13 to 15 minutes. Remove from oven and place pizza pan on wire rack. Let cool for 5 - 8 minutes before slicing. Enjoy!

Ingredients: Pizza crust - I make my own but store bought is fine Pesto 1 chicken breast - cooked and shredded 2 c spinach feta and shredded mozzerella cheese - use as little or as much as you prefer 1/4 to 1/2 c red onion cut into slices 1/2 c sundried tomatoes
Cooking_Steps: Assemble toppings onto crust, bake 15 minutes at 425 or until crust is to your liking

Recipe_Name: Chipotle Chicken and Corn Salsa Pizza
Ingredients: 1 can (7 ounce) chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, 2 chicken breasts, 1 cup corn (fresh off the cob or frozen), 1 pre made pizza crust, 1 1/2 cups shredded mozzarella, 1 red onion, 1 can (8 oz) pizza sauce, cilantro (to taste), lime (to taste) , salt and pepper (to taste),
Cooking_Steps: <ul Dice up chicken breasts and mix with chipotle peppers and adobo sauce and marinade for at least 30 minutes. In a mixing bowl combine corn (fresh off the cob or frozen), cilantro, diced red onions and chipotle peppers Roll out pre made pizza dough on to a pizza pan. Spread sauce on the pizza Top with shredded mozzarella and marinated chicken and cook for 7 minutes in a pre heated 350 degree oven Add corn salsa and cook for an additional 8 minutes or cheese is melted let sit out for 3 minutes Serve and eat

Ingredients: Homemade Pizza Sauce: 2 tsp. olive oil, 1 Tbsp. butter, 4 garlic cloves {minced}, 1 3/4 tsp. onion powder, 1/4 to 1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes, 3/4 tsp. dried basil, 1/2 tsp. dried oregano, 1 can tomato sauce, 4 Tbsp. tomato paste, 2 tsp. brown sugar, 2/3 cup warm water, 5 TBSP. Parmesan cheese {grated}, Homemade Pizza Dough: 1 1/3 c. water(warm), 2 1/4 tsp.yeast, 3 1/2 c. flour, 1 tbsp. salt, 1 tsp. sugar, 2 tbsp. oil, Pizza Toppings of your choice (I used the following) 6 ounce cooked hamburger,, 4 ounce pre-cooked bacon pieces,, 4 ounce pepperoni,, 1 green peppers,, 1 cup mushrooms, 1 onion, 1 1/2 cups shredded mozzarella, 1/2 cup fresh Parmesan petals,
Cooking_Steps: Sauce: <ul In a large pot on medium heat oil and butter Saute minced garlic for a few minutes Quickly add onion powder, red pepper flakes and oregano Stir a few times then add tomato sauce, tomato paste, brown sugar, Parmesan cheese and water Simmer on low heat for 1 to 2 hours . Dough: <ul Add your dry yeast to the warm water & let proof for about 10 mins. Add your dry ingredients to a mixer bowl Mix to combine and slowly add your oil and yeast mixture that has been proofed. Mix on med. speed to combine, then on low speed for about 10 minutes until a ball forms Put your dough balls (divide into 2) in an oiled bowl, Lightly brush oil all over the ball cover in saran wrap & put in a warm place until doubled in size About 2 hours. Pizza: <ul Make up your pizza sauce ahead of time. Make your dough recipe allowing time for rising. Grease a cast iron pan with shortening or oil. Put your pizza dough into the pan and lightly press it to fit the bottom and up the sides of the skillet. Let rest a few minutes and finish spreading as the dough is very elastic. Assemble your toppings, by making your pizza upside down. By this i mean add about half of your cheeses first, then your veggies, then the meats, then add your sauce over the top and the rest of your cheese on top. This will help prevent it from getting soggy on the bottom and the sauce will go through all the toppings as well. Bake in a preheated oven on 425 for about 25-30 mins.or until the crust is golden brown. Let rest 10 mins. before cutting and serving.

Ingredients: 1 pizza dough, 1/2 pound sweet Italian sausage, 1/2 cup pizza sauce (Homemade recipe HERE if you need one), 4 slices Provolone cheese, 4 slices Mozzarella cheese, 18 slices pepperoni slices, 1 egg, Italian seasoning, Parmesan cheese,
Cooking_Steps: Cook sausage over medium-high heat until cooked through. Remove and place on a paper towel lined plate to drain. Meanwhile, make the pizza dough. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Roll dough into a rectangle on parchment paper and then place on a baking sheet. Spread sauce in a long strip down the middle of the dough. Layer on the provolone, pepperoni, mozzarella, and sausage. Fold one side in over the sausage and then fold in the other and pinch the dough together. Then pinch the dough together at the short ends to seal in. Flip the long roll over, brush with egg wash, and sprinkle with the Italian seasoning and Parmesan. Bake for 20-23 minutes until golden. Let it rest for 5-10 minutes and then cut into 1 inch slices (12 slices) and serve with extra pizza sauce for dipping.

Ingredients: 1 package Pillsbury Pizza Dough, 1 can (8 ounce) Pizza sauce, 1 - 2 Tomatoes (chopped), 1 cup Iceberg Lettuce (shredded), 1 lb Ground Beef (cooked and crumbled), 1 package Taco seasoning, 1 Onion (chopped), 1 cups Shredded Cheese (your choice I used mexican blend), Taco sauce to taste,
Cooking_Steps: <ul Pre heat oven 350. Brown ground beef until cooked thoroughly add taco seasoning to cooked meat (Simmer according to package) Roll out pizza dough and place on pizza pan Spread pizza sauce on dough Add crumbled hamburger and chopped onions Bake in oven for 12-15 mins or until crust is browned When done, add shredded lettuce, chopped tomatoes, (you can add what ever toppings you like) sprinkle and shredded cheese Cut and serve with taco sauce.

Ingredients: 1 package crescent rolls, 1 package cream cheese, 1 package hidden valley ranch dip mix, 2 carrots finely cut, 1/2 cup chopped red bell pepper, 1/2 cup chopped green bell pepper, 1/2 cup chopped broccoli, 1/2 cup chopped onion,
Cooking_Steps: <ul Preheat oven to 375* Stretch crescent rolls to square shape on nonstick baking sheet Bake 11-15 minutes or til golden brown Allow to cool Mix cream cheese and ranch mix in a bowl adjusting to taste Spread mixture on crust Place veggies on top Cool in fridge for 1 hour Enjoy :)

Ingredients: 2 large pre made crust, 2 medium onions thinly sliced and separated into rings, 1 small sweet red pepper, cut into 1/8-inch strips, 2 tablespoons butter, 2 pounds thinly sliced deli roast beef, cut into 1/4-inch strips, 2 jars sliced mushrooms, 1 jar cheese wiz, Shredded mozzarella cheese,
Cooking_Steps: <ul Melt butter in skillet Saute onions & peppers Add roast beef and mushrooms Add what ever seasonings you like Spread cheese wiz on the crust Add toppings the top with mozzarella cheese We live in a camper so we do all our cooking and baking on out treager smoker/grill Turn the grill on to 400/450 Put the pizzas on the grill for about 10/15 minutes Then switch it to smoker for about 5 minutes And BAM!! The BEST tasting pizza u could ever wanna eat or try. The smoke taste is unbelievable

Ingredients: Thicker cut Canadian bacon- not the thin stuff (Ham works too) Shredded Mozzarella cheese Pizza sauce (or spaghetti sauce) Pizza toppings of choice (I used pineapple, well drained)

Ingredients: 1lb. To 1/2lb. - ground venison (or beef or whatever meat you prefer) • Jalapeños • Goat Cheese - crumbled or chunks • Green or Black Olives • Shredded Cheddar or Mozzarella Cheese • Pizza Sauce • Store Bought or Homemade Pizza Dough
Cooking_Steps: Make up meatballs and bake until browned on both sides - flipping once. Sauce dough, add 1/2 shredded cheese. Put toppings on. Add other 1/2 shredded cheese. Bake until cheese is melted and crust is golden brown.

Ingredients: Basic pizza dough Two cups of freshly shredded fresh whole milk mozzarella 1 cup of ricotta 2 tablespoons of feta 1 clove of garlic 2 tablespoons of olive oil Five thinly sliced grape tomatoes
Cooking_Steps: Press dough onto pizza pan and proof at 400F for five minutes Put clove of garlic in garlic press and then mix the pulp with olive oil and brudh over the warm crust. Top with shredded mozzarella, then intermittently drop little dollops of ricotta. Place the tomatoes in between the ricotta. Sprinkle the feta all over. Bake at 400F for 20-25 minutes, until cheese is lightly browned and crust is golden.

Ingredients: Garlic & herb dough Merlot marinara sauce Mozzarella cheese
Cooking_Steps: Grease either a pizza pan or cookie sheet. Spread dough & bake 3-5 mins. Then add sauce & cheese. Bake additional 12-15 mins.

Ingredients: 2 cans of pizza dough or biscuits , 2 cups mozzarella cheese , 2 tablespoons Italian seasoning , 1/3 cup olive oil , 8 oz pepperoni , 1 cup Parmesan cheese , 1 clove garlic minced ,
Cooking_Steps: JustAPinch - more here!!

Ingredients: *This only makes 1 tortilla size pizza so if you are making for several, be sure to double or triple your recipe!** Approx 1/4- 1/2 lb ground beef or ground turkey, 1/2 TBSP taco seasoning, 1/4-1/2 cup refried beans, 1/4-1/2 cup salsa (jarred or homemade), 1/4-1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese (or your desired flavor), 2 flour tortillas, Your choice of toppings ex: tomatoes, green onions, olives,
Cooking_Steps: <ul Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown ground beef in skillet. Add in taco seasoning. Drain if needed. Spray baking sheet with non stick cooking spray. Lay one tortilla on sheet. Spread with beans, then with meat. Cover with second tortilla. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven. Spread top tortilla with salsa, then, top with cheese and desired toppings. Bake an additional 5-10 minutes or until cheese is melted completely. Cool slightly before cutting.

Ingredients: 3 Pita Bread, 8 ounce Pizza Sauce, 1 cup Shredded mozzarella , Your favorite pizza topping,
Cooking_Steps: <ul Preheat oven to 350 degrees Bake pita bread for 5 minutes Remove from oven and top with sauce, your favorite pizza topping and cheese. Bake for another 5 minutes or till cheese is melted Cut and serve.

Ingredients: 1 Pillsbury pizza dough (or your favorite dough recipe), 1 can tomato paste, 1 cup Canadian bacon, 1 cup pepperoni, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, 1/2 cup of sharp cheddar, Pizza seasoning,
Cooking_Steps: <ul Preheat oven to 425 Season tomato paste to taste (I some times substitute with a white sauce) Mix Sauce and all your fixings in a bowl Set aside Roll out Pillsbury dough to a nice even layer Cut the rectangle into 2 squares Place half of your sauce mixture onto one half of the squares and fold over either to create a triangle or a rectangle press the edges Gently karate chop the middle to create 2 even halves and then cut Reheat with remainder of dough When you have 4 portions make 3-1 inch slices in tops to allow venting or you will have a blow out Place in the pre-heated over for 25 min or until golden brown or your desired texture When finished let sit for about 10 min Enjoy

Ingredients: 1/2 batch pizza dough, homemade recipe, or store-bought, 1/2 cup pizza sauce (click here for another homemade recipe) , 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1/4 cup sliced pepperoni, Additional toppings of your choice,
Cooking_Steps: On a floured surface, roll your pizza dough out into a large rectangle. Top with sauce, cheese and pepperoni. Using a pizza cutter or a very sharp knife, cut the dough into long strips, then into squares, so you end up with about 20 squares. Stack the squares onto of each other, and stack into a greased loaf pan. Cover the pan with plastic wrap and allow to raise for 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Baked for 20-25 minutes until the top is golden brown. Allow to pizza to rest for 10 minutes before turning onto a serving platter. Serve with additional pizza sauce, if desired. submitted by StickaFork.net - much more here!
